Headline: We have received meals with spoiled‚Ä¶
Review: We have received meals with spoiled produce or missing ingredients on a few occasions. Meals are delicious

Headline: Great recipes that are easy to follow
Review: Great recipes that are easy to follow. The meal choices are always great and change up often so there‚Äôs always something new to pick.

Headline: The food is delicious with very‚Ä¶
Review: The food is delicious with very creative recipes. I have cooked with many ingredients that I never would've used. It is a little pricey but definitely worth it.

Headline: The food is fresh and the recipes are‚Ä¶
Review: The food is fresh and the recipes are delicious.  Customer service is knowledgable and helpful.

Headline: there ya go
Review: Use a lot of dishes in prep and cooking, But what are ya gonna do?

Headline: Billing cycle disrupted and bank account overdrawn ‚Ä¶
Review: I loved HelloFresh until they charged me two days earlier than they normally do and overdrew my bank account. I called customer service and was told ‚Äúthere‚Äôs nothing they can do, no refunds, no way to stop the billing.‚Äù This was a very crappy thing to do during the holidays. It really messed me up financially.

Headline: Poor quality‚Ä¶
Review: For the 3rd time the meat was leaking in the box (which means the packaging was not sealed) and it was half defrosted even though I was home to open it right away.

Headline: The food was excellent and simple to fix
BEWARE!!
Review: BEWARE!!! 1. The quality and quantity of food has diminished and is no longer appealing or a value. 2. The way the accounts work feels and frankly is preditory.  I can not properly pause my account through the app.  I can skip weeks but onlu so many so eventually you will sneak in a shipment and charge me for food I  neither want ot ordered.  It is always the worst (cheapest for you to produce, item. I don't end up using it so I give it away or I throw it away.  I have had my account hacked and food shipped to ramdom people without my consent and HF refused to help, refund or anything despite the fact that the food went to an an address where I do not live nor is my card registered to, etc.  Horrible customer service all around. I used to love it; now I despise this service.

Headline: They are easy to work with and solved‚Ä¶
Review: They are easy to work with and solved my problem right away.

Headline: Know what works for you.
Review: I love hello fresh, it takes time to know what and how many meals a week work for you and or your family..

Headline: Got a box when I didn‚Äôt want it, wasn‚Äôt there, and with meals I didn‚Äôt want
Review: *EDIT* They reached out to me and offered a full refund for my box! Will update review upon receiving the refund.   I changed my box delivery frequency to every other week. Somehow, I still got a box on Dec 22, even though the app showed that I wasn‚Äôt going to receive that one and I was out of town. On top of that, I didn‚Äôt even choose the meals that came in that box. Since I was out of town, I had a friend come get it, but the delivery driver failed to follow instructions and put the box inside my building, making it very difficult for my friend to retrieve the box. When I called hello fresh for some assistance, the best they could do was a $9 credit, as if that‚Äôs anywhere close to the amount I paid for the box. Ridiculously terrible service

Headline: Spoiled food, over priced, no solution
Review: Most shipment arrived spoiled due to poor transportation. I threw away SO much food. Hellofresh does not refund you for this, they only ‚Äúcredit‚Äù you toward the next box. They were very helpful with this, but the next box would arrive spoiled and I would not get the credit from the previous box, only credit for the box that just arrived spoiled since the first credit was ‚Äúused‚Äù on the next spoiled box. So I basically was buying rotten food over and over and over again. This happened so much and the only way to use the credits was to give up the promotional discount. That‚Äôs when I realized how EXPENSIVE these meals are at regular price. $45 per meal is way over my budget - and that‚Äôs not for any extras or fancy options. That‚Äôs the base price for 4 SMALL portions.

Headline: Hello Fresh offers interesting recipes‚Ä¶
Review: Hello Fresh offers interesting recipes and so far my Mom  and I have loved them! I really like being able to choose from the different categories of meals such as Bestsellers (always good), Fit & Wholesome and Quick & Easy. The choices are wonderful! The ingredient quality is excellent, too!

Headline: I never received any meals I getting billed for the second one
Review: I never received any meals now I am getting billed for second one

Headline: They are SCAM and you will see the‚Ä¶
Review: They are SCAM and you will see the meals after they charge you and they are not going to refund your money even if you don‚Äôt finalize your order! Stupid ordering process and VERY RUDE customer care!

Headline: Meals are delicious
Review: Meals are delicious. There is always something new on the menu to try. The recipes are easy to follow. I wish there were more options for weight loss meals.

Headline: Routine Buster!
Review: This is an organized way to get yourself off of fast food and unhealthy "go to" recipes you have been leaning on for years.   I ordered the two person option 3x per week.  The meals offered a good variety, large portion sizes and reasonable calorie intake (even in the standard plan).  The preparation took on an even, steady rythm from one meal to the next, so no surprises.  The meals tend to go a little heavy on the salt recommendations, but you can control that yourself.  I didn't tap into the "premium" options, but for variety, that might be something worth mixing in from time to time.

Headline: Food tastes great
Review: Food tastes great, easy to prepare. Packaging, shipping and delivery is fantastic and well done.

Headline: Amazing company
Review: The app needs some work

Headline: Average quality and service
Review: Average quality and service. Don't like to fry burgers.

Headline: Little upset my box hasn‚Äôt arrived
I have been very pleased
Review: I have been very pleased with HelloFresh because they have made it easy for me to serve healthy and tasty meals so easily and quickly when I get home late in the evenings.  Everything is pre-measured and gathered together.  The instructions are written clearly and are easy to follow.  Each meal states the time required to prepare it so one knows even before ordering how much time would be needed to prepare for that one.  The helpings are sufficient and filling. The cost is reasonable.  The delivery has been excellent. The food is packaged in ice with great insolation to keep it fresh till I arrive home.  The site is easy to navigate with information on each meal offered, lots of variety, and the ability to make changes when necessary.   I have been using HelloFresh for over 25 meals to date and plan to continue with them.

Headline: Discounts are not accurate
Review: Discounts are not accurate. Decline in food options and flavors

Headline: I loved the variety of meal choices
Review: I loved the variety of meal choices, also how fresh all the ingredients were and how easy the recipe cards were to read.

Headline: All meals have been great
Review: All meals have been great. There is absolutely no waste.

Headline: Have received bad vegetables a couple‚Ä¶
Review: Have received bad vegetables a couple times, no card for recipes, and last order had a card and bag for something I didn't order and didn't receive what I did order.

Headline: I can be sure my mom will have a great‚Ä¶
Review: I can be sure my mom will have a great meal

Headline: Shipping is to expensive and for the‚Ä¶
Review: Shipping is to expensive and for the free breakfast it‚Äôs the same thing week after week

Headline: The last meals I received were great
Review: The last meals I received were great. Loved the Shepherds Pie, and the Spicy Peruvian Chicken. I like that everything you need is in the box. I wish I could afford one every week.

Headline: Pasta packages were beyond expiration‚Ä¶
Review: Pasta packages were beyond expiration date (October 2023) and items were recieved in December 2023. Unable to make my meal as a result. Garlic powder package was open and powder all over contents of bag

Headline: Pretty good but some quality issues
Review: Occasionally recipe cards have been missing and sometimes the fresh ingredients (tomatoes, potatoes, scallions, etc.) have gone bad in less than a week before we can get around to making them.The recipes are good but it seems to be falling into the trend again of great service for a month or so and then for whatever reason the quality starts dropping off.

Headline: I really enjoy making the meals and‚Ä¶
Review: I really enjoy making the meals and adding new ideas to our menus. The portions and ingredients work well for us.  I am disappointed but not surprised at how their amazing sounding deals (to bring back an old customer or recruit new ones) end up being just 10% off a box or a benedit so spread out that it doesn't actually help me come back.  Maybe that's the only way they can make it cost effective, but I'd rather not have the marketing blitz and then feel let down.  My family's tastes and my budget make it something I need to do for a treat, not all year.

Headline: Nice service for those not wanting to‚Ä¶
Review: It is a nice service for those not wantwho do ing want and have to come up with weekly meals.Pricey for those on a strict budget, but convenient nonetheless.

Headline: Customer service representative was‚Ä¶
Review: Customer service representative was amazing, very patient found solutions and friendly

Headline: Perfect for busy families
Review: I love the convenience of having all the ingredients needed and not having to go to the store. The variety of meals is super too.

Headline: We love it!!!
Review: The food is easy to make with the instructions provided. It is delivered on time consistently. The quality is excellent. Everything I had was delicious! I love it!!!

Headline: Great recipes and food
Review: Great recipes and food. Fun to cook.

Headline: Tasty recipes and easy to prepare.
I had paid for hello fresh for about‚Ä¶ All in all it was a wonderful experience. They treat you with respect and understanding.
Review: I had paid for hello fresh for about two months so I could help my daughter out in another city. She loved the food it was just what she needed and we were very thankful for the service. When I needed to stop the service I was treated with respect and understanding and the lady on the phone helped me out. I would definitely consider doing HelloFresh again in the future. I wish you could like stop it for two or three months at a time instead of just one week. The website can be a little difficult for me to navigate but I‚Äôm not good with computers.  All in all it was a wonderful experience.

Headline: Delicious and satisfying
Review: I love the variety of meals, and they‚Äôre so easy to make! I‚Äôve made meals I would have never attempted on my own. Delicious and satisfying ‚Äî awesome!

Headline: Recipes are delicious, quality of ingredients questionable
Review: Recipes are fun, but ingredients aren‚Äôt of the best quality. Produce seems old (for example limes look like they are close to expiring- coloring turning brown/yellow, herbs wilted/dried up). Sauces amongst other liquid ingredients seem ok.

Headline: Great meals and a lot of variety
Review: Great meals and a lot of variety!  I am very pleased with the Hello Fresh program.

Headline: Quality of produce is lacking
Review: Quality of produce is lacking. Most of the meals were good. You get more bang for your buck buying your groceries and cooking and you choose your products- better quality.

Headline: Fresh & Easy
Review: Fresh, easy, delicious

Headline: Deliveries on time
Review: Deliveries on time, food is fresh!

Headline: Two meats compromised
Review: We have had a few deliveries where one of the meats were compromised and had to be discarded. Otherwise we have been happy with these deliveries

Headline: I love the convenience
Review: I love the convenience, the meals are healthy, very tasteful, easy instructions. Great for families with busy lifestyles.

Headline: My orders were wrong several times and‚Ä¶
Review: My orders were wrong several times and I was refunded about half the price of the meal itself. There were also times where my meals didn‚Äôt arrive on the day it was supposed to. We pay too much for this service to have so many issues.

Headline: My opinion
Review: Always get what I order and it‚Äôs on time . I didn‚Äôt give them a five b/c sometimes the veggies are not always that fresh. Overall I like the variety and always trying something new.

Headline: Easy to use, great variety
Review: The food quality is great, the beef and chicken are always fresh and neat! Lots of veggies options too

Headline: It should have many many more vegan‚Ä¶
Review: It should have many many more vegan options - some weeks there are zero meals, some 1, others 2 and it makes it hard to want to maintain business with a company that doesn‚Äôt cater to plant based diets. The variety of vegan options is also dismal- curry or rice bowls is usually the norm. There are way more options out there than those two! Hire a vegan who is also a chef to help you out!

Headline: Excellence
Review: I absolutely love the quality of the foods I receive. The seasonings are fresh and premeasured. Produce is fresh. Meats are precut for each dish and the directions on the beautiful recipe cards are so easy to follow. Then, to top it all off, I love how the paper bag packaging doubles as a trash bag!

Headline: Food is great and easy
Review: Food is great and easy. Downside is the rewards‚Ä¶I  haven‚Äôt been able to add my free reward items ever and am suppose to get a free breakfast item each box that I am unable to add either, I called customer service twice and was told to just wait a week or two and it would show it never has.

Headline: Missing items
Review: Missing items, damaged produce, and one meat out on top ... Not by freezer pack.

Headline: I was sent broccoli that smelt so bad‚Ä¶
Review: I was sent broccoli that smelt so bad three days after arrival I had to wash my entire refrigerator. It looked normal but smelled beyond horrible. I put in in an additional ziploc bag to try to contain the smell and put it in my garage trash. The next morning my entire garage stunk of it. I have no idea what was wrong with it but I have never experienced anything like that. - update I was very leased with the quick response from Hello Fresh. I was given a refund and a little extra but was most happy to hear they are following up with their food safety team. Glad to hear they take food safety seriously.

Headline: Missing delivery
Review: Last week my delivery went missing.  I  called and they  kindly removed the charges. I am waiting  anxiously for the next delivery to arrive.

Headline: Really good.. almost great‚Ä¶
Review: I‚Äôve been making meals for a few months now. The spices are getting old. I recognize that by limiting ingredients you can simplify business processes but south west spice, cream cheese and scallions appear often. Also, instructions call for so much salt and pepper, sugar and butter that in many cases I just ignore them because the food winds up over seasoned. Clarify pinch, and good amount and drizzle.

Headline: I was told our box had been cancelled‚Ä¶
Review: I was told our box had been cancelled and account credited. Now I got a notice that it‚Äôs being delivered.

Headline: Delicious, convenient, and fast
Review: Really love the fact th the only decision I need to make is which meal I want to make on any given day. I love that I don't have to search for any ingredients and the meals I usuallyblick can be completed in 30 minutes or less

Headline: I did not want a shipment this week due‚Ä¶
Review: I did not want a shipment this week due to the holidays and 3 additional adults staying at my house.  I indicated on the app to skip this week.  Now I have $100+ Hello fresh consisting of 2-1 pound pkgs hamburger and a chicken breast in my freezer and 2servings of various vegetables and spices which will probably go bad before I use them. I am considering discontinuing my membership because I find it repetitive and expensive.carol Al-Kobri

Headline: Delicious and Easy!
Review: The food is always delicious and easy to make. It has helped me create a better eating schedule and healthier habits. Absolutely love it!

Headline: Absolutely terrible service
Review: Absolutely terrible service. By far the WORST customer service I‚Äôve experienced. Never again.

Headline: I really haven‚Äôt had such a great‚Ä¶
Review: I really haven‚Äôt had such a great experience this time around, as the menu hasn‚Äôt been much too my liking and then switching the menu around with meals that i might like ends up costing me alot more than what I‚Äôve subscribed for.

Headline: Food is always AMAZING makes it so much‚Ä¶
Review: Food is always AMAZING makes it so much easier to not overeat . It‚Äôs just enough for my family and teenagers will gladly make dinner . I also have saved so much money on groceries that would get wasted

Headline: Convenience is the only reason I keep‚Ä¶
Review: Convenience is the only reason I keep this.

Headline: so easy to do business with
Review: so easy to do business with,let alone, picking out menu items.

Headline: Several recipes had tomatoes
Review: Hello Fresh found this review and extended an apology AND credit for the error! Appreciated. Several recipes had tomatoes. These were not good red tomatoes. Mealy and dimly red.

Headline: Food is good; Nearly every box has something wrong‚Ä¶
Review: Nearly every box has something wrong (ingredient package broken causing beef to leak out; missing vegetable; missing turkey) but they've always compensated us for the mistakes. I just wish I didn't need to run to the store every time to get something that didn't go right.

Headline: I am very grateful to you HelloFresh¬¥s‚Ä¶
Review: I am very grateful to you HelloFresh¬¥s team of experts for gracefully helping my family go through one more day through the amazing collection & selection of great recipes you put together every time we order in. Thank you so very much; Have a happy festive season!

Headline: We enjoy the meals and meal preferences‚Ä¶
Review: We enjoy the meals and meal preferences from Hello Fresh.  However, the meal sizes got a little smaller, and there are extra costs on a lot of the meals, which prevent us from being able to order every week.  Example, a pasta meal costs more from hello fresh than our local food store lately.  We‚Äôre are on a strict budget.

Headline: Great food
Review: I‚Äôve loved every meal I‚Äôve had so far. The only thing I hate are the paper bags the meals come in.

Headline: Read directions THEN cook!
Review: This makes the evening so much more manageable when you have a busy life

Headline: Yesterday the driver couldn‚Äôt deliver
Review: Yesterday the driver couldn‚Äôt deliver.  Today I got my box but the ice packet had melted so I got the box that sat on the truck all night.  Not sure how fresh it is.

Headline: Overcharged and no one cared
Review: Loved the food but recently canceled due to an overcharged weekly meal - basically paid $100.00 for 3 meals -  be careful when you switch out a meal for a premium pick meal

Headline: The produce sent is extremely‚Ä¶
Review: The produce sent is extremely inconsistent. I‚Äôve thrown out the green beans from two meals because they were slimy with rotten ends. I‚Äôve also received rotten peppers and ginger that is dried up like a prune.

Headline: Perfect follow thru on quality‚Ä¶
Review: Perfect follow thru on quality expectations...

Headline: Find a more reliable delivery service
Review: Veho indicated the package would arrive on 12/19 between 7:13pm and 10:13pm. This delivery window seems stupid to me, but that didn‚Äôt even matter because the package never arrived. Now they are saying it will arrive between 10:20 pm and 1:20 am. We are cancelling our subscription because we have had MANY issues with veho. This is just the latest.

Headline: Helping with Weight Loss
Review: My husband both need to lose weight and this has helped us immensely.  Just the right amount of protein and vegetables.

Headline: No customer service and no management
Review: I asked for management and was told they are not in. I was told I would receive a return call from management. Never did. No help, no call back, no customer service. Terrible. I want my money back really! Apparently that's a problem so canceling my account seems appropriate.

Headline: The meals were very tasty
Review: The meals were very tasty, and the directions were easy to follow. I give it five stars.

Headline: Quality is great‚Ä¶portions just right ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
Review: Quality is great‚Ä¶portions just right ‚Ä¶ verily easy to prepare most everything under 30 minutes.. regards

Headline: The HelloFresh system did not update my‚Ä¶
Review: The HelloFresh system did not update my delivery information, therefore, I did not get my delivery. The contact rep, did update it and provide me a credit on my account. We will see how the next delivery goes.

Headline: Ingredients are repeated over & over
Review: Ingredients are repeated over & over. A variety in veggies would be nice.  Menus can sometimes be lacking.  And by the end of my 4 meals my 4th meals veggies aren‚Äôt as fresh. Price with promos are reasonable.

Headline: The food has arrived fresh
Review: The food has arrived fresh, the meals have all been exceptional. The choices to pick from are many and delicious. Ordering or holding an order, when out of town has been easy. There is nothing that Hello Fresh is doing wrong.

Headline: I'm extremely pleased with the‚Ä¶
Review: I'm extremely pleased with the convenience of the meal service and the menu options- they're all so delicious. And I love the fact that they are so easy to prepare. Did I mention that my husband enjoys preparing the meals as well and he's Nita fan of cooking

Headline: Delivery was right on time
Review: Delivery was right on time.  Serving sizes were ample.  The food was excellent

Headline: Was not sent reminders about skipping
Review: Was not sent reminders about skipping. Then when I tried to skip I received the orders early and I never was refunded.several hundred dollars down the drain.

Headline: I think the meal selections are really pretty innovative
Review: I think the meal selections are interesting & the ease of ordering is beneficial.  I do think the pricing is a bit high once the shipping is added but I'm satisfied with the results

Headline: Great products and choices
Review: Great products and choices!  Fresh food and great flavor combinations.  Wish there were expiration dates on the meat.

Headline: Delivery as promised
Review: Delivery as promised, easy to cook and delicious and perfect amount

Headline: Hello Fresh is delicious and fun!
Amazing recipes!
Review: The recipes are easy to follow and delicious. Minimal items like oil, butter and salt/pepper to be added from your own supply.

Headline: Good variety of really good food
Fantastic easy meals!
Review: Fantastic easy meals!! We have loved every one we have received!

Headline: The company is amazing
Review: The company is amazing. Always helping me quickly and efficiently.

Headline: Disappointing
Review: Ingredients aren‚Äôt always good. Portions are small  and deliveries sometimes don‚Äôt show up

Headline: Fresh food and great proportions
Review: Fresh food and great proportions! Cheaper than grocery shopping!!

Headline: Great first impression
Review: Delivery as stated. Food is fresh and easy to prepare. Loved the first recipe

Headline: Conveniency
Review: Conveniency. No need to gather ingredients. Everything is in the bag. Just a little on the expensive side.

Headline: I love HelloFresh!
Review: I love HelloFresh!! EVERY meal is delicious. Never have any ingredients missing and my boxes are always delivered on time. All recipes are super easy to follow!

Headline: Delicious
Review: It‚Äôs like eating at a different restaurant each night!

Headline: It was a hassle from step 1
Review: It was a hassle from step 1. Not only that but I signed up for 50.00 a week and yall tried to charge me somthing like 130.00 a week. My package showed up in the middle of my yard sitting on a box corner instead of placed flat and my porch wasn't 10' away from where my FOOD was thrown out like pig slop. Instead of giving me a refund when I canceled my subscription  yall tried to give me credit. Then I opened the box and it has only 1 of the leads I actually chose,the rest were things that I can't eat,things that could hurt me very badly. I will in no way be recommending you infact,I intend to make sure that nobody I know gets treated so horribly when there are many other company's just like yours that would actually appreciate my buisness.

Headline: Food good, quality control not so much
Review: For the most part, the recipes are good and the family enjoys them.  The issue I have is that I was missing part of  the proteins. Customer service addressed my concern and made things right.

Headline: components of my latest meal kit were‚Ä¶
Review: components of my latest meal kit were already open and and cant be used for the recipe

Headline: Overall Meals are great
Review: Overall Meals are great, and directions are easy to follow, customer service with Hello Fresh is awesome in fixing problems with orders.

Headline: The recipes and food are out of this‚Ä¶
Review: The recipes and food are out of this world. So much flavor! My husband said we could start a hello fresh restaurant, everyone would want to eat there. Seriously, I am a chef everyday because of the menu provided. Very happy to be with help chef again.

Headline: The produce has been coming in frozen‚Ä¶
Review: The produce has been coming in frozen and mushy

Headline: Price is way too high for a only 2‚Ä¶
Review: Price is way too high for a only 2 meals a week and each meal is so time consuming! Just not worth it to me!

Headline: Food is always delivered  in a timely‚Ä¶
Review: Food is always delivered  in a timely manner.  The meats are always good quality and the vegtables are always fresh!  You only need olive oil, butter, salt and pepper and you ALWAYS put out a restaurant looking dinner plate!

Headline: Did not get all the ingredients l
Review: Did not get all the ingredients l, my breakfast for life is no longer valid cant find an email to send to support and the app doesnt work.

Headline: The selections are wonderful.
Review: Do we like all the recipes? No, but that is solely based on trying new things, and HelloFresh offers that ability to "taste" fresh new ideas.

Headline: Box was supposed to be skipped but was‚Ä¶
Review: Box was supposed to be skipped but was shipped and contained foods I didn‚Äôt order and don‚Äôt eat. I gave it away.

Headline: Great selection and easy-to-cook‚Ä¶
Review: Great selection and easy-to-cook delicious recipes!

Headline: I love Hello fresh
Review: I love Hello fresh! Before I started ordering Hello fresh I hated cooking. Now I love it! Everything is so fresh and they some how make Everything taste amazing no matter who is cooking it. I never thought I could make something that taste so delicious. Thanks Hello Fresh!

Headline: Love that we are not wasting as much‚Ä¶
Review: Love that we are not wasting as much food with these meals. Helps my son and I eat healthier to.

Headline: Easy, fresh and good quality products
Review: AmazingVery organized Great experience

Headline: Delivery is always on time
Review: Delivery is always on time. Food is fresh, packed in box,with ice packs to keep cold. Menu choices are great, and very tasty.

Headline: Easy and tasty
Review: Ive learned many recipes are easy to make and great tasting.

Headline: We have loved almost every meal
Review: We have loved almost every meal. There have been a few that we didn't like. They are fun to make and easy. They look like upscale meals and my fiance loves them. She is allergic to a lot of food, so I like that I can pick and choose with so many different options to pick from.

Headline: Great meals conveniently delivered only‚Ä¶
Review: Great meals conveniently delivered only one complaint is potatoes have been too small for French fries we just adjusted our potato to mash to use

Headline: I live in Alaska
Review: I live in Alaska. Fresh produce is limited and pricey. Most meal kits don't ship here and even the ones that do cost more than $50 in shipping each week. Still worth it for our household. Taking meal planning and grocery shopping off the to-do list has helped me to enjoy cooking again. Plus both my partner and his daughter appreciate step-by-step instructions as they learn that cooking healthy foods with produce and flavor doesn't have to be complicated. There is plenty of variety, so if you don't like any specific recipe or ingredient you can just select something else. I also LOVE the market place items. It's like a little bodega delivered but without all the preservative to make snacks shelf-stable. You can taste the difference!

Headline: Good food
Review: Good food, easy instructions

Headline: Hello Fresh made our dinners easier and‚Ä¶
Review: Hello Fresh made our dinners easier and even my picky kids love it!

Headline: Bad quality & customer service
Review: We started doing hello fresh this past summer after having our first baby to make things easier on us. The quality of the produce and meat had never been great, but we dealt with it because it was usually still edible (outside of a few instances) and it was convenient. However the last few boxes we had received had grown increasingly worse. Old squishy garlic cloves, spotted/moldy green beans, moldy potatoes, rotten broccoli to name just a few. The final straw for us was biting into pork tacos made with ground pork, and discovering multiple pieces of bone. My husband bit into a piece of bone larger than a pea. When we contacted the company they asked if I was still able to make a meal without the pork (‚Ä¶the meal was pork tacos, so no‚Ä¶). they claimed to be so sorry and were going to make it right by issuing a refund, only to refund me $3. Yes THREE dollars. What a joke, will not be giving them business in the future.

Headline: Convenient but needs work.
Review: I love the recipes and the simplicity. They keep forgetting items in my meals and last box they forgot an entire meal. Ive been considering canceling due to these repeated errors. I also have been requesting more customizable protein options for different meals. Burgers, meatloafs etc, don‚Äôt have ground chicken or turkey options and i would really like a burger.

Headline: On time delivery
Review: On time delivery, great food and amazing variety!

Headline: We love the food
Review: We love the food, the flavors, quality, less waste. However, the written directions need improvement. Segmented step by step for uneducated cooker people.

Headline: Renewed membership
Review: Renewed membership. Have to say; chopping then boiling, broiling and frying at the same time can be difficult. Dinner was good.

Headline: Boxes MUST be delivered to front porch
Review: Boxes MUST be delivered to front porch. Neighbor took the last one as the driver just put it by the gate.

Headline: Love the meals, but NO REPEATS PLEASE!
Review: We are loving the flavors and unique meals, BUT, I am dissatisfied with the fact that I am getting repeat recipes.  I don't think I should be paying $78 a week for meals that I already have the recipe card for and have had before.

Headline: Hello Fresh is a great option for me
Review: Hello Fresh is a great option for me, as I'm a recent empty nester.  I.love the fresh ingredients and the variety of flavors.  The ability to skip delivery weeks is nice and I like that the company sends out rewards like a chance to try premium meals without the financial ding.  I've only been missing ingredients once and the wrong recipe came once, too.  Luckily you can easily look up the correct recipe.

Headline: Food is tasty but portions are small
Review: Food is tasty but portions are small. Discounts and rewards aren‚Äôt consistently applied. Not sure if I‚Äôll continue using this service.

Headline: Excellent for substitute cook
Review: I recently had surgery that precipitated my husband shifting to be the main cook for a couple of weeks. The recipes are simple, tasty, and come with an excellent recipe card that lays out the steps one by one to make it clear and easy. In my working days, we'd order on my busiest weeks for the same reason. Hello Fresh also helps us get out of our 'sick of everything I cook' times.

Headline: Horrible experience
Review: Horrible experience. Mistakes in my orders, horrible customer service & charges not approved by me. Be very careful when ordering and always check up on what is actually charged to you.

Headline: I ended up cancelling my subscription‚Ä¶
Review: I ended up cancelling my subscription due to several problems.  My last box delivery kept getting delayed and never did come.  The one before that was missing an ingredient and a couple of the sour cream packs were damaged.  These were the first 2 boxes of my new subscription so I didn‚Äôt see a point in continuing this ‚Äúservice‚Äù.  On a positive note, their customer service was very responsive.

Headline: Slightly over priced for the portions
Review: Slightly over priced for the portions. Food quality is very good.

Headline: Most of the time I really love Hello‚Ä¶
Review: Most of the time I really love Hello Fresh. We signed up after both of our children went to college. It cuts down on my shopping, my thinking of what to make for dinner, and we can choose healthy options. So far, we have liked many of the dinners. I like the little free things we earn too.

Headline: So easy to order
Review: So easy to order. Food and recipes are outstanding! Stayed with our daughter and son in law for a month while moving, they have Hello Fresh we loved it. So I signed up and am so happy. I‚Äôm very busy and grocery shopping is a chore that I basically don‚Äôt have to do now. Yay!!!!

Headline: Be wary as you might be signing up‚Ä¶
Review: A friend of mine has a subscription and so I‚Äôd thought I‚Äôd go on and check out the food‚Ä¶but it sent me through a loop of filling out information, which I thought I would have a chance to review before I placed an order.  But ‚ÄúNO‚Äù‚Ä¶and to make things worse, it then said I couldn‚Äôt change the order‚Ä¶what order?  I didn‚Äôt even get a chance to select my meals!  However, what I‚Äôm stuck being delivered are three meals that I can‚Äôt eat due to the high carbs and high sugar‚Ä¶which I indicated I didn‚Äôt want.  I can‚Äôt speak of the food, but they got $30, before I cancelled any further deliveries, out of me and lost a potential customer because of their questionable initial process.Update:  I was emailed by their customer engagement people and they apologized for the confusion, explained the process and then credited my card for the total amount.  I‚Äôm grateful for their monitoring of the reviews and pleased with the outcome, which is why I‚Äôm raising their rating to a 4

Headline: Didn‚Äôt like the choices that were‚Ä¶
Review: Didn‚Äôt like the choices that were picked for me   I was so busy last week I didn‚Äôt remember to edit my box

Headline: The whole family loves the recipes and‚Ä¶
Review: The whole family loves the recipes and helping to cook them.

Headline: Food is delicious
Review: Food is delicious.  I don't like rice or mayonnaise

Headline: Everything is fresh and easy to prepare
Review: Everything taste absolutely amazing. Food is all fresh and easy to prepare

Headline: I enjoy hello fresh
Review: I enjoy hello fresh, it's easy, pretty healthy. The only downsides may be the price and portion size

Headline: I thought you were sending ready-made‚Ä¶
Review: I thought you were sending ready-made food, but these ingredients for the food were sent to me. I don't have time to cook, but my experience was not bad because I did not order, but someone else did!!! :)

Headline: It's good food
Review: It's good food. I think the portions are too small, but maybe that says more about me :-). Does the rest of the world really just have 1 piece of chicken? Out of about 3 months worth of once a week meals sent to my house, 2 times I had a problem. I don't like that, as I think that's too often to have a problem. One time the contents were all over the place and one time they forgot the chicken. The first time I complained and I got a free dinner I think. The second time I didn't even bother, I had chicken breasts. I am doing this to get a handle on cooking. I have never cooked anything really, always eating out or x wives did the cooking. I think soon I'll stop the deliveries and cook the meals from scratch myself. For me this was a great way to start to learn to cook.

Headline: Seems like they‚Äôve figured it out
Review: Finally, everything was in the box! This has been a problem with every meal service and it is why I stopped Hello Fresh years ago. The meals have been easy to prepare and quite tasty.

Headline: The recpe's are easy to follow and‚Ä¶
Review: The recpe's are easy to follow and delicious. Very convenient that all the ingredients are delivered to your door.

Headline: Ingredients are not good quality‚Ä¶
Review: Ingredients are not good quality anymore and  recipes are not good

Headline: Lots of issues.
Review: Constant issues with produce quality or missing ingredients.  Billing issues.   Rewards I can't use.   You guys wiped out $135 in credit I had earned by referring friends.

Headline: They pay attention to detail when‚Ä¶
Review: They pay attention to detail when boxing up your meals,

Headline: Was skeptical but love it!
Review: Great taste. Easy to make. Good quantity. I was skeptical but super impressed and happy.

Headline: So far I‚Äôve enjoyed hello fresh
Review: So far I‚Äôve enjoyed hello fresh. However meat has been leaking on 2 occasions. They‚Äôve responded well to those issues

Headline: Everything we have had has been‚Ä¶
Review: Everything we have had has been delicious. The only suggestion I have would be to offer regular couscous instead of The ‚Äúpearl‚Äù kind.

Headline: Hi my name is akash
Review: Hi my name is akash, I want to tell my story than your supervisor of delivery driver is very rude and racist towards drivers. He is making false promises. He hires drivers from amazon . And fire them when his need is done. His name is Amrit Virk .

Headline: Use to be better
Review: I had used your services off and on and always had a good experience but this time I found the quality of the produce to low, little variety in the menu, my discount was never applied and my delivery was left a day early and as a traveling RN- I wasn‚Äôt around and it was left outside to long and a bear took it.

Headline: Like the garbanzo rcipe
Review: Like the garbanzo rcipe, but lemon was very small dinged up to point couldn‚Äôt be zesty d.

Headline: Old produce
Review: Unfortunately, both meals had green beans and they both had gone bad and needed to be tossed.

Headline: Good but time consuming
Review: We enjoy the food in general however, there is still a lot of prep time and depending on the meal  portions are a little small for family of four.

Headline: Just ok
Review: The meals are pretty decent. I canceled for 2 reasons. When my meals arrived, the ice packs were already completely thawed and I had to wonder how safe that was for the items in the package. Then, if I couldn‚Äôt get to cooking the meals right away, there was no use by date on the meats. I did get sick one time after a pork chop meal and have to wonder if it was related to one of the reasons above.

Headline: The food was good for the most part but‚Ä¶
Review: The food was good for the most part but the packages arrived very late on the delivery date and often the cooking directions were bent and in poor shape. The frustrating part is trying to cancel your subscription - it‚Äôs nearly impossible to do without assistance - in fact it is impossible!! I probably won‚Äôt rejoin.

Headline: Good
Review: I don't have any complaints. The recipe selection is good, the recipes themselves are good, they offer lots of promotions & discounts & so far they've taken care of any problems that have been on their end.

Headline: I am a picky eater
Review: I am a picky eater, so when I am making something I'm pretty sure I won't like...its amazing!

Headline: poor quality of the produce and meat‚Ä¶
Review: poor quality of the produce and meat this week.

Headline: Will continue using

Headline: Horrible customer service
Review: Horrible customer service, they will not respond to messages or phone calls.  I have been attempting to cancell my service for over two weeks and I continue to get weekly menu notices. The food is not fresh and some items were missing.

Review: Food is good.  Instructions get somewhat confusing when they keep including what to do different for additional persons.  For example, our plan is for two people but instructions keep including what to do for four.  I do not care what I need to do for four..!  Also, there are a lot of hidden fees.  Be more upfront on what the meals cost.

Headline: Customer satisfaction

Review: my sister-in-law passed away, so I have to head to So cal I called Sunday morning to put delivery on hold for three weeks but they said I called in too late for this week so I‚Äôm out $70. Saturday was the cut off I did four meals per week, so that‚Äôs why I am frustrated with hello Fresh . Bad customer service‚Ä¶.

Review: The flavors, diversity and ease that nance come into our life since we started hello fresh is top notch. If I had one small complaint, it would be there is never enough garlic, but that‚Äôs an easy fix. üòâ

Headline: I canceled my subscription a few weeks‚Ä¶
Review: Update: After seeing my review on here, Hello Fresh contacted me and made it right. They've canceled my subscription and refunded me for the unexpected charge. This was the only problem I ever had with the company, so I've changed my rating to reflect that.Original post:I canceled my subscription a few weeks ago but for some reason, it didn‚Äôt go through. I received an email this morning stating that my payment to Hello Fresh has gone through and that my box will be delivered on Monday. I called customer service and they were unable to refund me and stop the delivery. It‚Äôs ridiculous that they can change the meals in the box after the deadline but can‚Äôt cancel the delivery. It‚Äôs also ridiculous that I had to cancel my subscription twice in order for it to process.

Headline: Chicken always arrives bad
Review: Chicken always arrives bad. They can't keep it cold enough when shipping.

Headline: My box was delivered to the wrong‚Ä¶
Review: My box was delivered to the wrong address, good thing I have a nice neighbor, who brought it over.

Headline: The service is fast and the recipes are‚Ä¶
Review: The service is fast and the recipes are delicious! And I save money!

Headline: I was trapped filling  out all my info‚Ä¶
Review: I was trapped filling  out all my info and payment information, before even seeing the menu options, the website is not easy and I couldn‚Äôt cancel my subscription nor delete my payment info, I ended up being charged for 2 boxes, without receiving them. I‚Äôll definitely post negative reviews, so you can change your website and help others from my bad experience. Also customer service had terrible atitude when I called to cancel my subscription and asked for a refund for the boxes I never received.

Headline: It's not easy to pick your own meals
Review: It's not easy to pick your own meals. I feel like I have to do a lot of navigating. When you don't pick your own meals you get a lot of rice and beef, bowls or soft taco stuff. While they are all good in taste, you don't want the same kind of all in one dinner. Also, sometimes the produce isn't the freshest when it arrives. Lastly, I've tried to claim my 16 free meals and that has been a disaster. Hello Fresh has changed my life and I plan on continuing with the subscription; however, I feel like a lot of people "scam" the system. I am a home care and hospital nurse and I've watched people order their "free box" in everyone that resides in the home names. So, where is the loyal customers free boxes. Also there are a lot of specials where you get free breakfast for life, etc etc, do I need to unsubscribe to get all these perks?

Headline: No complaints
Review: No complaints.  Presently impressed with the variety of meal selections and services.

Headline: Really like this service.
Review: I'm enjoying not having to shop or figure out what to make. I like being able to select from choices and then get a shipment of everything I need. And my delivery person is good at getting it there early. No idea why this review is in my elderly father's name. I'm M. Annis

Headline: We love the food
Review: We love the food! You don't have to think, shop or plan. The shipping is great! Love the skip option. Free breakfast selection is very poor. If you want to give us something at least give us good stuff. The prices are expensive but the convenience is superb.

Headline: I got 4 meats and 4 bags but only 3‚Ä¶
Review: I got 4 meats and 4 bags but only 3 recipes. So I don't know how to cook one bag. I'm going to make tacos from the ground beef. This is too much work! Don't send me any more food.

Headline: Loved it
Review: Loved it, it was fresh and surprisingly good tbh

Headline: Perfect potion size for two
Review: Perfect potion size for two. We tend to over cook when just doing a meal from our younger days. Hello Fresh reduces waste and allows to avoid over eating Helping me meet my weight loss goals Great empty nest choice

Headline: I would like to see more seafood meals
Review: I would like to see more seafood meals. More veges in the meals. I do like the way it's packaged so easily I can tell which items go with which meals. I appreciate the way the recipe is written out.

Headline: Not so Fresh
Review: The limited diversity in HelloFresh's meal selections diminishes the overall culinary experience, leaving customers wanting more adventurous options. The billing practices add frustration, as users are unexpectedly charged, and canceling becomes an intricate process. Moreover, the short shelf life of ingredients raises concerns about freshness, affecting the overall quality and reliability of the service. In essence, HelloFresh falls short in providing a seamless, varied, and convenient meal kit experience.

Headline: Made the turkey and biscuit recipe
Review: Made the turkey and biscuit recipe. Used a lot of my own ingredients at home. I'm so glad I gade them on hand. My carrots were rotted. They were soft, not crunchy. Also, the tyme and cream cheese was missing. Ended up using my baby carrots and dried thyme instead. Surprisingly, I had cream cheese in the fridge. It's odd this happened with 3 ingredients.

Headline: My husband and I enjoyed most of the‚Ä¶
Review: My husband and I enjoyed most of the meals. They were hit or miss with our son. In the end it was too expensive for a 3 person home.

Headline: Pretty expensive and the menu is not‚Ä¶
Review: Pretty expensive and the menu is not that great.

Headline: I love having products delivered‚Ä¶
Review: I love having products delivered straight to my door, with the exact ingredients and portion sizes I need. The preplanned meals, that are so very tasty by the way, and the ease of use and way it gives me time to focus on other things is wonderful. Sometimes, even though the convenience is worth a lot, it is still a bit pricey for me as a single person. I can definitely stretch my dollars more at the grocery store and get more food that lasts me longer. So sometimes it‚Äôs a toss up. I just choose what‚Äôs more important to me in a given month, more time on my hands = HelloFresh to the rescue, or saving some money = grocery store trips!

Headline: Awesome recipes and food
Review: Awesome recipes and food!  We have loved every meal!

Headline: The Comcast of Food Delivery: Just Wants Money
Review: Food is ok. A lot of repetition and a lot of the same ingredients for ‚Äúdifferent‚Äù recipes. I had two instances over an 11-week period where bonus items I earned were never included. Their algorithm does a horrible job of picking recipes that are similar to previous ones. I honestly don‚Äôt believe the algorithm exists and your pre-chosen meals are based on what is in stock. No items have expiration dates.Money is their main focus and they will pester you with massive amounts of e-mails to give free boxes to others. It‚Äôs annoying. Customer service and communication is horrible. They refuse to send any notifications regarding costs or meals to subscribers. When I left, they made it perfectly clear they didn‚Äôt care about that. Nobody even asked if there was an issue. My one e-mail about why I canceled was completely ignored. I‚Äôm currently looking for a better service. HelloFresh has potential but they couldn‚Äôt be less concerned, They only thing important to them is getting money out of your account.

Headline: Questionable value
Review: Not cost effective relative to food cost and portion Poor customer service‚Äîhad an order where the meat was missing at delivery I reported it but nothing was done and no credit given

Headline: All the recipes have been great and‚Ä¶
Review: All the recipes have been great and easy.

Headline: Directions are clear and the dinner‚Ä¶
Review: Directions are clear and the dinner results were delicious!

Headline: Food recipes are delicious and‚Ä¶

Headline: Fantastic

Review: I was suppose to get a free box but didn‚Äôt

Review: Hello Fresh is always fantastic and they always have great food to choose from. My order is always on time and with everything inside the box. We love Hello Fresh!

Headline: Convenient but low quality
Review: Convenient and easy to make recipes. Multiple times I got rotten produce that I had to throw out. After the first few weeks you notice the recipes and ingredients get really repetitive

Headline: Always Receive Quality
Review: I have always received quality ingredients, especially with meat. I truly love HF because I do not have to shop for individual items. Furthermore, I dread grocery shopping. So, I love that this is able to arrive at my house and I can easily transport it to the fridge. I wish there was a way to reduce the amount of waste though. I am really not sure if this is a solvable issue because obviously it needs to stay cold.

Headline: It has really helped me learn to cook‚Ä¶

Headline: Very happy with every aspect of Hello‚Ä¶

I consider myself an experienced cook, but I have enjoyed ordering things I would not normally cook for myself and enjoying them.  Although the cost may seem a bit higher than what you would spend for dinner, you see the savings in the grocery store when you are not spending extra money on meals you end up not cooking, or on extra ingredients you need for one or two meals.  Everything is in the box, easy to go.

Headline: Perfect portions fresh product amazing‚Ä¶
Review: Perfect portions fresh product amazing meals

The quality and actual amount of the ‚Äúfresh‚Äù ingredients is now so bad I end up having to go shop for the ones I can‚Äôt use. The ground beef is so pale and fatty looking it resembles what I can only imagine mashed hotdog meat would look like. Any recipe that needs potatoes never has anywhere near the amount it should have always around half to 2 thirds of the weight it should be.

Headline: Dinner is a snap with HelloFresh

Headline: We have loved every meal so far!
Review: We have loved every meal so far!  Fresh quality ingredients and simple recipes with lots of flavors!

Headline: HelloFresh makes me life so easy!
Review: HelloFresh makes me life so easy!The only thing I don't like is the lack of supporting current customers. They are all about us recruiting new people but I feel as a member I don't get to many "surprises" or freebies for being with you. I wish there would be a way for us to earn a free box, free premium meal. I spend $50 a week for two meals and we love the food. The portions are sometimes small, but that's okay. I just wish there was something like "Every 5 boxes you get 1 box for free." I have been looking for other companies like HelloFresh to see about a loyalty program or lower pricing.

Headline: Horrible customer service

Headline: All the food has been great and my‚Ä¶

Headline: Delivery is always as promised

Headline: Food is tasty
Review: Food is tasty. Lots of options. Customer service great too

Headline: Quality of the food is great!
Delivery problems
Review: They used to leave box at door now they leave it in our apartment locker and it‚Äôs so hard to get it out of locker

Headline: The food is good
Review: The food is good. Easy to prepare and the instructions are very easy to follow. If I had to list on criticism it would be to add more vegetables to the order. Green beans

Headline: Love that all the ingredients come‚Ä¶
Review: Love that all the ingredients come together for you to prepare a meal.

Headline: Good value
Review: The food is fresh and the meals have been tasty and satisfying.  Plenty of food for two people and we often have a bit left over for a lunch the next day.  Occasionally some of the produce has been a little past prime by the fourth meal, but it hasn‚Äôt been a big issue.

Headline: Hello Fresh Goodbye Money
Review: Used them once previously, found my delivery 4 days later rotting in an obscure place in my yard. Saw an offer "12 meals free" completed the offer snd so far have paid $80 for 3 meals for 2 people.Just a total rip off I added the cost of ingredients which were approximately $5-$7 per meal. Not for anyone not wanting to wash 24 items after a long day at work. All the meals taste the same, sour cream with everything, anaheim peppers amd limes galore.Cheap meat products, and portion size ONE person could eat the meal as a snack. My so is 6ft 4 he laughed at the cooked meal amd he is a healthy weight. $80 out for $14 worth of food. I will never try them again. I have made 3 calls to customer service and was basically told tough!! I will be making a chargeback as sadly it appears to be my only recourse.Bland FoodSmall PortionsMisleading OffersPoor POOR Customer Service.

Headline: So far every recipe I‚Äôve received has‚Ä¶
Review: So far every recipe I‚Äôve received has turned out delicious and was simple to make! It‚Äôs amazing for a busy single mother such as myself to make sure that my son and I get a good home cooked meal.

Headline: A lot of ground beef, ground pork or chicken
Review: Selections a basically ground beef, ground pork, chicken tenders, or chicken pieces, pork tenderloin can be had on certain dishes but it quite a bit of a price jump. It‚Äôs nice to have if you don‚Äôt know what to eat or haven‚Äôt planned ahead what you are having for dinner, everthing is included, just follow directions and it‚Äôs done.

Headline: Most Excellent
Review: Hello Fresh is wonderful, especially in cutting down on my "what to have for dinner" decision making process. I have found their menu to be delicious and wonderful.

Headline: Everything is fresh and the recipes are‚Ä¶
Review: Everything is fresh and the recipes are Fantastic! So very happy to have found this, its well worth it!üòäüß°üß°üß°

Headline: Happy J&J
Review: Meals are very good.  Love the packaging of all the ingredients, good directions and timing of preparation.   My husband does not cook nor understand the terminology or measurements used in cooking.   However, we decided to prepare the meals together.  He has learned so much and I have laughed so hard at some of his mistakes.   So it‚Äôs been a great activity for us to do together.

Headline: The delivery was supposed to arrive on‚Ä¶
Review: The delivery was supposed to arrive on Wednesday but did to arrive until late Thursday. Meal bags were soggy, recipe cards were destroyed.Hello Fresh exceeded my expectations. They made everything right and I appreciate it.

Headline: Order was left on front porch again‚Ä¶
Review: Order was left on front porch again this week.  Our dog was within reach of it but I was home & heard them deliver it. Was to get it before the dog did.

Headline: Taste great with a few setbacks.
Review: The food is good and the quantity is enough for 2 people with leftovers. However, some of the sides are repetitive and it's a chore to recycle the ice packs. Some of the dishes don't have enough meat like in the photo's. Great if you like to cook, if you don't there is still a lot of cooking to do. The flavors are great.

Headline: Excited Waiting for box
Review: Waiting to receive my box, so excited to introduce my daughter to the kitchen and new foods I hope she will love to try as well as enjoy because we cooked them together.....be back with a update

Headline: Easy to prepare meals
Review: We love how simple the meals are to prepare and also how we are mixing up our dinner selections trying new things. The spice blend packets are great and we are amazed with how well dinner turns out using new menus items to prepare them.

Headline: I love the food
Review: I love the food, but I won‚Äôt stay if I can‚Äôt keep my discount.

Headline: meals are delicious, very convenient. When on a busy schedule no need to go to the grocery storeuy secdule no need to go to the grocery store
Review: perfect size portions, very delicious and easy to make receipts

Headline: We've subscribed to Hello Fresh now on‚Ä¶
Review: We've subscribed to Hello Fresh now on a weekly basis for a couple months.  Food is well packaged and portions are reasonable.  All ingredients are included minus salt, pepper & oil, which most folks have on hand.  Step by step directions are easy to follow.  I enjoy not having to figure out what to make EVERY night.  Unfortunately, most all the meals are beginning to taste the same.  I find their "discounts/rewards" are a bit confusing so haven't redeemed them yet, but most annoying is their constant barrage of emails.  Initially, I felt their pricing was a bit on the high side, but after a couple months now, I realize I'm spending less on groceries since I'm not having to go to the store  so often and therefore am not purchasing products I end up throwing away and my fridge stays a lot cleaner.

Headline: Hello Freezerburnt
Review: Hello Fresh is actually Hello Freezerburnt. Each meal was salty, a small portion, and tasted bad. I went to cancel today (Monday) since my card was just charged double the amount I was expecting. Customer service said even though my box does not ship until Friday, they refuse to help in any way. They then stopped responding and the callback I was promised from management never came. Bottom line: this food is gross, they make it impossible to cancel, and they charge WAY too much money! Never sign up with them!

Headline: Fresh and delicious food
Review: Fresh and delicious food. Easy to prepare.

Headline: CSR you Rock
Review: Although we weren't shopping for a planned meal service , the minute I am ready  Hello Fresh has already  won us over üòÑ. And it was all due to customer service , the CSR was thoughtful,helpful and was  just in great mood a job well done üëç  well just the whole experience  his  manager should appreciate that And Kudos  for the whole team! kudos , and thank you all, now days working issues out with a human or robot  can go from a bummer to disaster real quick lol Oh how I wish I could remember the CSR who made my error go by byThank you,  your teams ROCK!!  Keep your kindness all year through. Happy Holidays , ‚õÑOlivia and Kyle Toribio

Headline: Hello Fresh is a game changer
Review: Very satisfied with Hello Fresh. The majority of the time the produce is very fresh but every once in a while I‚Äôll get something that looks a bit rough. It‚Äôs only happened a couple of times and I‚Äôve been doing Hello Fresh for about 2 years. The recipes are delicious and every week there is a variety to choose from. After 2 years I‚Äôve tried pretty much all of them. I love that there is no commitment and you can skip weeks whenever you need to. I save my recipe cards so that I can remake the recipes. I do wish that they would sell their spice blends although I have found where you can google the blend and duplicate it. Hello Fresh has made me a better cook and it‚Äôs definitely gotten me out of the ‚Äúwhat am I going to make tonight‚Äù rut that I was in. Update: just received my box and no recipe card in it! Sorry but have to downgrade my review. Also when I called them about it they said I could just get the recipe card online which is true but because I save my cards, this is not very helpful.

Headline: A lot of the produce was spoiled
Review: A lot of the produce was spoiled. Looking for different company,this is the third time something wasn't right.

Headline: The food is good/expensive
Review: The food is good. But it‚Äôs expensive. And getting more expensive. Maybe you need to quit giving away and help those that are your customers. Just a thought before I leave you.

Headline: Loved the way it arrived
Review: Loved the way it arrived, is packaged and I haven't tried both - just one..but it was very good. The downside here? Your website is not user friendly.

Headline: Repetitive choices
Review: Repetitive choices, with limited meat and fish meals.

Headline: I have learned so much from Hello‚Ä¶
Review: I have learned so much from Hello Fresh.  When you have been cooking dinner for 50+ years, you make boring and repetitive meals.  The menus from Hello Fresh have made a big change.  My husband now eat zucchini!

Headline: I got charged when I wasn‚Äôt prepared
Meals were good didn't take long to‚Ä¶
Review: Meals were good didn't take long to prepare

Headline: Easy
Review: Easy, fresh, menu all terrific

Headline: The app is fantastic
Review: The app is fantastic although Im active and haven‚Äôt had The service yet ; I can‚Äôt wait to experience new greatness in ‚Äú Hello Fresh ‚Äúwonderful foods.

Headline: Meals are different and delicious‚Ä¶
Review: Meals are different and delicious without having a lot of ingredients.  Easy to assemble, quality meats.Thank you!

Headline: Lactose Free options
Review: Lactose Free optionsPlease offer plain greek yogurt instead of sour cream which is in many of your recipes. I omit this and end up with so many packets of sour cream that I end up giving away. Plain greek yogurt is an easy substitute for a lot of your meals.

Headline: Happy customer
Review: Easy to use app, great food, reliable and convenient

Headline: These fresh meals are great!
Review: These fresh meals are so easy, while quite good! Very flavorful and very quick to prepare. There is NO waste and I think we are actually saving money at the market.

Headline: The amount of meat is far too little
Review: The amount of meat is far too little. This is not enough.

Headline: So nice to have meals planned for me
Review: So nice to have meals planned for me. Easy to prepare on a moments notice. Thank you HelloFresh!

Headline: Once you sign up it‚Äôs nearly impossible‚Ä¶
Review: Once you sign up it‚Äôs nearly impossible to get out of it.

Headline: the convenience of not shopping and the‚Ä¶
Review: the convenience of not shopping and the impossibility of wasting ingredients is awesome.

Headline: I love Hello Fresh
Review: I love Hello Fresh. The meals arrive to my door, are perfectly proportioned and delicious! The menu card are also very easy to follow

Headline: I have a $60 credit on my account and‚Ä¶
Review: I have a $60 credit on my account and hello fresh won‚Äôt let me use it until I go through all the discounts and it makes me SO mad because some of the ‚Äúdiscounts‚Äù are like 4% off a box

Headline: The meals with pasta are like hamburger‚Ä¶
Review: The meals with pasta are like hamburger helper. Nothing special about them. The price is too high for hamburger helper

Headline: We love our meals!
Review: We love our meals. Everything we've had so far is delicious. It's also created great family time for us while we prepare the meals. The vegetables are always fresh and the way the meals are put together taste so delicious.

Headline: Repetitive meals
Review: Repetitive meals. Especially if you forget to change you meals.  It‚Äôs always fairly the same.  So, I canceled my account and received my order for the week and ended up with a very rotten onion!  Because my account was canceled I was given a credit on my canceled account to use if I reactivated my subscription!

Headline: The food is always fresh
Review: The food is always fresh.  Every dish we have ordered we have loved.  Easy to make, full of flavor.

Headline: Just what we need
Review: Just what we need, no waste. Menus are tasty. Different ingredients make the experience enjoyable.  Saves thinking what will we have for dinner tonight.

Headline: Loved it in the beginning, but wasn‚Äôt safe later.
Review: Loved it in the beginning. Everything was fresh and the meats came fully frozen with large ice blocks. The last month or more, the meats came thawed. I made several calls about this issue and it continued to happen. I just can‚Äôt risk eating meats that aren‚Äôt safe. In our last order, the pork wrapper wasn‚Äôt sealed shut.

Headline: My dream has turned into a nightmare
Review: I am supposed to be every-other-week delivery but got switched to weekly but I did not change it to weekly. Also the price of 4 meals went up $20 but I wasn't informed that a price increase was coming.  How rude!!!  I don't want it anymore.  Make no more deliveries.

Headline: I would give you a five star but I‚Äôve‚Ä¶
Review: I would give you a five star but I‚Äôve noticed that my rate went up 20 dollars a week. I‚Äôm not sure why this is happening.

Headline: food was wonderful and arrived as‚Ä¶
Review: food was wonderful and arrived as promised

Headline: The meals arrived in excellent‚Ä¶
Review: The meals arrived in excellent condition, The meat was well chilled.  I will recommend to my family and friends ‚ù§Ô∏è  Thanks very much

Headline: Needs bigger portion sizes
Review: The meals are good and surprisingly flavorful however the portion sizes are very small for adult dinners and the ingredients are always the same for every recipe: green pepper, rice, onion, green beans. It would be nice to have it switch up as well as we‚Äôve only been ordering for like 2 months and already have repeat menu options week over week so eventually we will stop ordering due to running out of new things to try.

Headline: I enjoy the recipes almost always
Review: I enjoy the recipes almost always. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôm getting the freshest vegetables and cooking time is a lot longer than what you promote.

Headline: Easy and tasty
Review: Easy to make and always really tasty! Have done Hellofresh in Germany for 6 years and now in the US, always happy with quality and price-value. Also, cause you do not waste food.

Headline: I have loved all the food so far
Review: I have loved all the food so far!  It has been great at helping with portion control, which is good for my diabetes.

Headline: Lately produce has not been great‚Ä¶
Review: Lately produce has not been great quality, especially the meal I prepare at the end of the week (on Friday when my items arrive on Monday).However, when I reached out to Hello Fresh, they are always quick to make things right. Although they can't send more produce, they credited my account for the food that was spoiled.

Headline: I love the ease of cooking‚Ä¶
Review: I love the ease of cooking instructions, the produce is always fresh and delicious.

Headline: Hello fresh is overpriced garbage
Review: Hello fresh is overpriced garbage, they keep charging you after you cancel your orders and make it as hard as possible to fullly close your account. They do this so they can charge you more money and autopick all the worst items that nobody wanted. Contacting support is also a disaster because they just lie as much as they can to get you to get off the phone. I would never recommend this to anyone, especially if you like good food.

Headline: Your meals are so good and healthful
Review: Your meals are so good and healthful, we just love the choices. Thank you very much Hello Fresh!

Headline: A Lil jumpy
Review: Had items in the cart. Never ordered. They have ran my card 50 times for items I never confirmed the order on.... not a great start...

Headline: Save 4 meals they charged and shipped 8‚Ä¶
Review: Save 4 meals they charged and shipped 8 meals and refuses to refund or cancel stay away

Headline: The ease of having each meal‚Ä¶
Review: The ease of having each meal prepackaged and delivered is super convenient at this busy time of year. I do wish there were more gluten free or keto options since my daughter has celiac.

Headline: Perfect everything
Review: Perfect everything. Made cooking so much easier.

Headline: Trying the vegan meals this box and not‚Ä¶
Review: Trying the vegan meals this box and not liking them for the $. Box was delivered to a neighbor's house instead..I know that's on FedX not you but was a pain finding it and getting it. For second box thought discount was more not worth fighting about , I'm just going to cancel after this 2nd box.** not long after writing this review HelloFresh reached out to me, I was very surprised they offered me some $ off. I appreciate that and the quick response from them.

Headline: Misleading
Review: Still haven't received my free box of food....

Headline: Did not verify an order, but received one.
Review: I previously had a Hello Fresh short term subscription. After I received a notification of new offers, I went to the web site and logged in. Immediately, a notice was received thanking for returning. I looked at various options, e.g. reduced meal plan costs for 6 meals and the cost. I did not accept the plan and exited the site. Several days later, I received a notice that my shipment will arrive shortly. I called, and immediately had the program cancelled. Two of the meal kits were very similar- same green beans, same cilantro herbs, but different meats. I was appalled that I received a box of goods worth at most $20, plus I did not want a make it yourself subscription. I was looking for ready made meals. There was no verification page to confirm an order. Shame on you Hello Fresh.

Headline: Hello Fresh is the Best‚Ä¶
Review: I‚Äôve tried a lot of food delivery services and nobody beats Hello Fresh. The meals are amazing and there‚Äôs always a plenty of menus to choose from. I love this company. Their customer service is on point and they‚Äôll always go above and beyond to help. If you‚Äôre thinking about trying HF‚Ä¶go for it. You won‚Äôt be disappointed!!!!

Headline: Good, nor great.
Review: As a new mom, this gets rid of the daily "what should I make"... which is really nice and very convenient. However... every week there is something rotten in our bag, never fails. And only after 3 months, meals are already really repetative.

Headline: All the recipes are great
Review: All the recipes are great. I‚Äôve even saved two of them to make later

Headline: Our last box came rotten
Review: Our last box came rotten. After communicating the issue, Hello Fresh refunded me. Other then this I love all the meals i have received:) Thanks for the quick refund

Headline: Great food and tasty easy to make
We love getting the recipes and‚Ä¶
Review: We love getting the recipes and ingredients delivered to our door. We don‚Äôt have think about what‚Äôs for dinner or shop for the ingredients. It‚Äôs just there in the fridge!

Headline: Fun for the kids to help with
Hello Fresh = Scammers
Review: Hello Fresh sent me a 50% coupon to use if I "unskipped" getting meals that week. I went online to use the coupon and spent time choosing the meals. When I went to check out, the coupon wouldn't work. I went on their "Chat" 7 different times, trying to find out why the coupon wasn't working. Each time on chat, an agent assured me the coupon would work. It never worked. Finally, I was so annoyed that I went on chat again (their phone service was not available) and stated that I wanted the agent to assure me that I would not be sent or charged for any meals since the coupon didn't work. The agent told me that my order was cancelled, and I would not receive any meals. I snapped pictures of our chat conversation because I didn't trust what I was being told. A few days later I received a box of 3 meals (meals I would never choose). HELLO FRESH CHARGED ME FULL PRICE FOR THE MEALS.  I immediately called their customer service to get a refund and I was treated very rudely and told I could not get a refund. I called them again and the same thing happened. Worst customer service I've ever dealt with!!! I'm sure the response from HF will be that they don't want their customers to have a bad experience. So WHY did I have it? I went on chat 8 times and called twice and no one helped me. Does that sound like they train their agents to actually help customers? Their bogus coupon didn't work. They assured me I would NOT get a box of meals or be charged for it, but I did receive the meals and was charged full price. HF had opportunities to refund the charges, but instead of doing that, I had nasty customer service people who were rude. I cancelled my membership and will NEVER subscribe again. THERE IS NO DOUBT IN MY MIND THAT I WAS SCAMMED! None of this should have happened. When it did happen, the company should have remedied it immediately. An honest, reputable company does that. STAY AWAY FROM HELLO FRESH! Dealing with them is simply not worth it.

Headline: Not having to come up with a nice meal‚Ä¶
Review: Not having to come up with a nice meal is on the top of the list. Then conscience coming to my door. Not always the freshest of ingredients but often tasty!

Headline: I love the thought behind HelloFresh‚Ä¶
Review: I love the thought behind HelloFresh and the options available. That said, I would give it five stars if there wasn‚Äôt always an issue with every delivery. There is always some sort of a quality issue or an issue of things being being left out.

Headline: I never got a box 1 time but yet I'm‚Ä¶
Review: I never got a box 1 time but yet I'm being charged for them.

Headline: Gone Downhill
Review: We used hello fresh for a really long time with no issues, then we stopped and came back to it and we‚Äôve had nothing BUT issues. 4 or 5 weeks in a row we were sent meals missing ingredients or the wrong meals altogether. It‚Äôs disappointing and frustrating.

Headline: Overall good, but...
Review: Overall, I'm very happy with the meals. There's a nice variety, the instructions are excellent and, for the most part, the ingredients are of good quality. I have been disappointed with the produce on many occasions. I have gone so far as to check the produce to make sure I don't need to replace it with something from the store before I prepare the meal.

Headline: Great service
Review: Cheaper then the grocery store

Headline: Reinstating the meal service
Review: 1. The food was delivered to my house (this had been a primary reason for canceling the orders before).2. The meals were fresh and the instructions for their preparation accessible to both myself and my husband,

Headline: Delayed shipment
Review: A shipment got delayed and the meat in it went bad. I recieved no refund or anything to compensate this.

Headline: The application is easy to use
Review: The application is easy to use, the recipes are easy to fallow and it's cheaper than. Groceries on some weeks

Headline: Delicious!
Review: The vast majority of meals we received were delicious and very flavorful, with a couple tasting just fine. I love not having to think about what to make for dinner, but don't like that each order has a fair amount of plastic waste. I appreciate having fresh ingredients like lemons and shallots, items I would rarely purchase myself.

Headline: Scam artists.
Review: My first box never arrived so I called and canceled my subscription‚Ä¶ the next week I was charged for a second box and when I called to ask why instead of admitting to their mistake they accused me of trying to scam them somehow. Horrible experience and I still haven‚Äôt gotten my refund.

Headline: I would rate no stars if I could
Review: I would rate no stars if I could. I highly do NOT recommend this service. My box was  THREE days late. The chicken leaked all over, food was bad, the shrimp was soaked through the bags AND the ice pack leaked! I didn‚Äôt even get the recipe cards‚Ä¶

Headline: The meat makes me sick every time and‚Ä¶
Review: The meat makes me sick every time and it arrives frozen, stays frozen until the morning I plan to cook something. The vegetarian options are good but I don't trust anything that needs to be refrigerated or frozen.

Headline: The recipes are easy to follow
Review: The recipes are easy to follow, for the most part, and some of them are very tasty!

Headline: The recipes are good and easy to follow‚Ä¶
Review: The recipes are good and easy to follow food quality is great sometimes sides aernt very good or to repetitive. But overall very good product

Headline: Review
Review: Love that you are able to pick your own meals! They are always very easy to make with the instructions made clear. I wish the boxes cost less or the rewards gotten gave more

Headline: Soooo convenient
Review: It's just too convenient for meals to arrive at your door with everything that you need, especially when you are so busy with students during the school year. We have a bunch of favorite meals that we look forward to popping up in every week's selection like the sweet chili beef and shepherd's pie.

Headline: LOVE HELLO FRESH!!
Review: We tried another company and couldn‚Äôt even come close! From your packaging to recipe cards (had to blindly find the others on my phone boo!) to fresh food and decent portions I will never go anywhere else!!! LOVE HELLO FRESH!!!

Headline: Meat package leaked
Review: The only real problem was the meat pkg. was leaking!As I was putting the bags and meat into the refrigerator I noticed my hands getting wet but thought it was from the freezer pack.  I then noticed how sticky my hands were and there were meat juice spots on the floor that led to the refrigerator.  I then rinsed off all of the meat packages and put them into their own ziplok baggies.  That evening and the next day(this morning), the refrigerator had a strange smell.  I finally took all the ingredients out of the paper bags (because I feel the meat juice leaked onto the paper bags) and into their own Bowls or plastic bags and put them back into the refrigerator.I cannot wait to make one of the meals tonight!  I am sure it will be delicious!Thank You

Headline: Yet again the package was delivered‚Ä¶
Review: Yet again the package was delivered wrong and stolen this is the 3rd time. The delivery company they use seem like they have random people driving for them. I have ordered at 13 times at my location and there seems to be a problem at least once a month. HelloFresh customer service is useless and unhelpful.
