Review: I never received my order and the only thing they could do was give me credit which was nice for future orders but now I have to go and buy groceries when I have already paid for factor.

Headline: Cannot ship orders
Review: I have had two orders in a row not ship and later cancelled. I then had to wait 10 days for refunds..

Headline: Food is amazing and lots of variety
Review: Food is amazing and lots of variety. It makes me eat healthier. Portions are spot on. Website a little confusing for an older person. Just wish cost could stick around $10 per. Once I'm paying full price, I'll have to cut back.

Headline: My family does not like the food and it‚Ä¶
Review: My family does not like the food and it wasn't  enough for them.  I have over 30 boxes and have frozen them.  I want this account closed.  I skipped the boxes for the rest of this week and still got it. Do not ever send me a box again!

Headline: It was a tough go at first
Review: It was a tough go at first. I started our meal deliveries around the holidays . Well deliveries were a day late. However, Factor75 took care of the problem quickly and refunded my account. Now unto the food! Love it quick easy and tastes great!!! Can‚Äôt wait to see more menu options.

Headline: The food is excellent
Review: The food is excellent. Customer service is terrible. I can‚Äôt do businesses with a company that I have to constantly check to see if I‚Äôve been credited the correct amount for undelivered product and their policies make me suspicious of being cheated. It‚Äôs a shame because I‚Äôve tried many companies and this is the only one with great food.

Headline: Taste is great when I get the meals I‚Ä¶
Review: Taste is great when I get the meals I ordered; not so great when Factor selects them.

Headline: Love Factor!
Review: The delivery is always on time, and if there is a holiday or delay in delivery the company is good at giving customers a heads up. The dinners are high quality and delicious!

Headline: I enjoy the food
Review: I enjoy the food. However, I did not like the delivery date being changed without my approval. Also, the food is being delivered very late in the day and is not consistent. I originally received the food in the morning so I could have it for lunch. However, the last delivery was towards the evening and I had to go out and purchase lunch.

Headline: Delicious and easy
Review: Foods great. Delivery is timely. App is easy to use and adjusting meals or info is a breeze. Food gets a little boring, many are Italian/hispanic flavors. But add-ons are great and help mix it up.

Headline: The problem was in delivery of selected meals
Review: The problem was in delivery of selected food.  The food tastes good.  I've had 4 deliveries.  The first two were perfect.  The third only delivered 5 out of 10 ordered meals.  The fourth only delivered 8 out of 10 ordered meals.  This is not acceptable delivery.  I suggest if you are having this much trouble with components that you offer another screen to allow  picking alternates for substitutions if needed.  I'm really tired of the excuses.

Headline: Keep an eye on price
Review: Food was decent but they removed my discounts while they were still active without telling me. Glad I checked because the price almost doubled. Not worth near $15 a meal

Headline: No meals suitable for pregnant women
Review: No meals suitable for pregnant women. And difficult to cancel membership wasted 20 meals due to inability to cancel membership.

Headline: Good customer service
Review: Good customer service! Meals are enjoyable. Bigger portions and smaller prices would be appreciated.

Headline: The portions often seem small
Review: The portions often seem small. Tasty recipes and great ingredients but will they all fill you up? No.

Headline: The food is really good and my box‚Ä¶
Review: The food is really good and my box always arrives in a timely manner.

Headline: Changed my order
Review: Changed my order, very confusing cancellation/correspondence process. Tried to skip a week to review meals and they skipped the wrong week and refuse to work with me. You are essentially paying for marked up lean cuisines along with shipping charges‚Ä¶. Do not use this company unless you plan on getting overcharged and want a subscription service that‚Äôs difficult to cancel.

Headline: Great communication with customer‚Ä¶
Review: Great communication with customer service, great food, and SO easy!

Headline: Box lost
Review: Box lost changed delivery date twice at the end no food for that week. Disappointing

Headline: The meals are delicious!
Review: The meals are delicious and one meal is ample for my elderly parents when a salad is added.

Headline: Too many creamy/cheesy default meals
Review: Food is good but way too many creamy or cheesy items. Also spicy items as well. Especially in the default meals that seem to sell if we forget to customize our pick. A lot of ppl have sensitive stomachs or are lactose intolerant like myself and these kind if meals are few and far between if I want to have an enjoyable day not the norm

Headline: Great quick meals but need more veggies
The protein selections are great
Review: The protein selections are great. Wish there were more meals without chicke.  The veggies are ok. Delivery needs to occur on more than one day in case you are unavailable. Delivery service needs to ring the doorbell and not just leave your package outside to get stolen

Headline: Responsible seller
Review: Responsible seller.  Good quality food. On time delivery

Headline: Very tasty and plenty of it
Tastes good.
Review: I like the flavor.

Headline: Package arrive dripping wet
Review: Package arrive dripping wet.  Made mess in my condo a condo hallway.  Ice had broken and leaked everywhere.

Headline: The meals are good, the shipping needs work.
Review: The meals have been convenient and taste good, but have arrived broken with their contents spilling out on more than one occasion.

Headline: The food was great!
Review: The food was great!! No complaints!

Headline: The white stuff (califlower?) is pretty‚Ä¶
Review: The white stuff (califlower?) is pretty gross. My husband and I do not eat it anymore. We both really tried but just can't eat it. We are not crazy about the green beans either. I think we are going to cancel our orders. The meat on the other hand has been very good.

Headline: Meals are so good!
Review: Meals are so good. I like the variety also. Cost is not prohibitive either.

Headline: Great quality and excellent prices. Food tastes great and easy to order
Review: Food tastes great and easy to order. The pesto salmon is amazing!

Headline: Overall, good
Review: Everything I have tried so far has been delicious but I do wish there was more meat-free variety and less sodium.

Headline: My order did not arrive until 8 PM and‚Ä¶
Review: My order did not arrive until 8 PM and was not as cold as it should be. 2 of them were stuck together and not edible as well as another meal was not tasting right when cooked. Upon cooking my last meal, the black part at the bottom blew out on both sides getting all over my microwave. Cooking time is always the same so that didn‚Äôt play a factor. Very disappointed and will not move forward if this continues.Fist 2 shipments were great however.

Headline: A gift to my niece
Review: I have been ordering these meals for my niece. Her son that has Down syndrome was diagnosed with leukemia in November. They have barely left the hospital since then . I have been sending meals approximately once a month to them and they love them. Even Levi, fighting leukemia and is gluten free, took one of the GF pasta meals and licked the plate because it was so good. Thank you for allowing me to bless them with good, healthy meals

Headline: I received a box when I skipped it
Review: I received a box when I skipped it. I should not be charged when I clearly skipped a week. I‚Äôm considering canceling my subscription for concern this is going continue happening.

Headline: Didn‚Äôt get all of my meals got 10 out‚Ä¶
Review: Didn‚Äôt get all of my meals got 10 out of the 21 with no call had to call them.

Headline: Waste of Time
Review: Terrible experience as a brand new, first time (and last time) customer. My first meal box (16 meals) was supposed to arrive two days ago (Monday) via FedEx. It never did. It took two full days (currently 9 pm ET Tues) and three customer service engagements for them to notify me that the delivery had no way of making it to me this week due to logistics issues. Unfortunately, this seems to be a poorly run company. I canceled my subscription and will stick to meal prepping at home.

Headline: The customer service is excellent
Review: The customer service is excellent. The supply chain and packaging and/or shipping areas need work.

Headline: I enjoy the food
Review: I enjoy the food - it tastes great and it saves me hours so I can do what I enjoy and not have to cook

Headline: Meals I chose were too heavy with cream‚Ä¶
Review: Meals I chose were too heavy with cream and cheesecv

Headline: Flavorful meals that have helped us add‚Ä¶
Review: Flavorful meals that have helped us add variety to our weekdays without the cost of takeout.

Headline: So far we have liked our meal choices. The convenience of having balanced quick meals on hand is really nice. We are still trying out the different meal choices but so far Factor has done well for us.
Review: So far we have liked our meal choices.

Headline: Great tasting meals!
Review: Great tasting meals! Orders are often missing meals however which is a pain in the butt to rectify (pun intendedüòâ).

Headline: nothing‚Ä¶meals were similar to airline‚Ä¶
Review: nothing‚Ä¶meals were similar to airline coach meals,and small portions. vegetables were repetitive.meals were not delivered on schedule with no notification, leaving me with no meal for the evening.

Headline: I enjoy the variety of foods
Review: I enjoy the variety of foods.  They are delivered as they are scheduled

Headline: The app is not user friendly and and I‚Ä¶
Review: The app is not user friendly and and I didn‚Äôt find the section for dietary restrictions, I don‚Äôt eat pork, in my last meal plan  sent me three plan which pork in it.  I right the way canceled my account, by the way , their meals are not great and most of them are very soggy.

Headline: Waste money for food you won‚Äôt eat
Review: There isn‚Äôt a way to mark food you absolutely can not eat So if you miss a deadline you are stuck receiving and paying for what you won‚Äôt want to eat.  They do refunds - sort of - but what good does that do?  It‚Äôs a database.  Its shouldn‚Äôt be too complicated to have a default - no go setting on a limited number of base items, like proteins and know allergens.

Headline: 1st week food was not delivered on‚Ä¶
Review: 1st week food was not delivered on time.  2nd week did not get all the meals ordered, 3rd week substitution was made.  Some meals were better than others.  Need more choices‚Ä¶.too many chicken options.

Headline: No cooking necessary...
Review: I tried Hello Fresh first and quickly realized it was too much work for me. I saw a commercial for Factor and I was sold. Individual meals for me are great! The food is delicious. And I have control of what I receive. They are worth the money.

Headline: The most convenient food service one the market. Even
Review: The most convenient food service on the market! Recently have been concerned about the sodium and cholesterol because they seem extremely high! Excellent flavor!

Headline: Refund Policy needs to be adjusted
Review: I am a single income empty nester.  The quick healthy choices of Factor work well for me.  There was a shipping mishap over Xmas, which is understandable, but‚Ä¶.I get paid once a month and I budgeted for that order.The refund did not take effect immediately.  It had to wait until after my promotion? So I had to give up the promotion to get the refund I was entitled to?

Headline: My review is not about the taste of the‚Ä¶
Review: My review is not about the taste of the meals received.  My husband has enjoyed them.  My lower review is because I have twice tried to change meals within an order and neither time have I gotten what I ordered.  This is disappointing because I did not get what I was looking forward to eating.

Headline: My box was left outside my condo on a v‚Ä¶
Review: My box was left outside my condo on a v busy street at 5 am and easily could have been stolen.This has happened w newspaper, flower arrangement & other packages. I gave Factor my door code to leave the package INSIDE THE BUILDING WHICH THEY DID NOT DO.I've had too many problem w Factor & a quitting

Headline: Food taste and suggestions
Review: Food taste is usually always great with nice potions. Like selection but would like a few more in keto also don‚Äôt use nuts(almonds) in side dishes.The sauce in cups take away from side potions, maybe just put on meal and fill portion area. Love zucchini noodles, use more often.

Headline: I am missing meals and the calories on‚Ä¶
Review: I am missing meals and the calories on some foods are very high

Headline: Non Deliveries
Review: If I could get meals delivered on time would continue.  Weeks 2 and 4 did not get delivered and were thrown away by the deliverer.   Don‚Äôt have the time to deal with such inefficiency.  The meals were good and was actually beginning to lose dome weight.

Headline: I just went online and you‚Ä¶
Review: I just went online and you automatically shipped me meals that I did not order .I want a refund

Headline: Convenient but not much more affordable than restaraunts
Review: Most meals are tasty! Some sides could use more effort. Unfortunate that 2 meals had undercooked chicken and needed to be thrown away. Will be fairly expensive to continue without the discount though, so we're shopping around

Headline: The food is great
Review: The food is great. They sent me 2 orders with 10 meals. Then on the next order they only sent me 5 meals. Then I had to call to get some of my money back and now I have no meals until next shipment. I'm disappointed on the third shipment. Hopefully. this problem will not happen again because it throws off my diet. Other than that, the food is great.

Headline: Phenomenal Experience
Review: The weekly menu options are phenomenal.  Never had a meal I did not LOVE!!The app is simple, concise and easy to use.Shipping and delivery has been flawless!

Headline: It‚Äôs a relief to remove one of the‚Ä¶
Review: It‚Äôs a relief to remove one of the stresses in my life- what am I going to eat?!?!?Food is tasty too

Headline: Have had 3 boxes so far‚Ä¶
Review: Have had 3 boxes so far and all the food is fresh and delicious

Headline: Food tastes wonderful
Review: Food tastes wonderful!  Easy to cook. Great variety. Can‚Äôt say anything bad about these meals or the service.

Headline: Good, but garlicky!
Review: I have enjoyed the process of selecting my meals and trying different items each week. So far the food is fairly good. There have been a few that I have really enjoyed. My main critique is there is too much garlic in almost everything. Even when I choose options that don't specifically say garlic in the title, everything still comes with way too much garlic in it. A few of the items I've tried I haven't been able to finish because of the overwhelming garlic. I may need to explore other other ready-made meal services to see if there's one that isn't quite so garlic heavy. There have been a couple that were very good though, so I'm trying to give it more time to really give it a fair chance. It's been about 3 weeks, 6 meals per week, and so far I have loved about 3 or 4 of the 18 I've tried. I've thrown out 2 after a few bites because of overwhelming garlic. The rest have been in the "not bad but still wish there was less garlic" category.

Headline: Running Low or out of stock
Review: The food is great but the last 2 weeks, one of my meals was out of stock. I wish I could be told at the time of ordering you are running low or that meal is sold out.

Headline: Decent deal, hidden charges. View their BBB page
Review: I was suckered in by a great deal and wound up disappointed. My intent was to use factor to provide my breakfast and lunch meals. However, upon attempting to order breakfast meals, I noticed I was being charged extra per meal. When speaking with their chat service, the bot was unable to help. After about 5-10 mins of the runaround, I spoke with a ‚Äúreal-life agent‚Äù. I was informed that the base price only covers dinner and lunch type meals. While their food may taste good and convenience is great, I felt like I was duped. Luckily, I immediately canceled my order and hopefully won‚Äôt be charged at all. If I am, I will be filing a complaint with the BBB, where there are a toooon of complaints about them already.

Headline: Good Meals, Bad Delivery
Review: The meals are fantastic, but the delivery logistics have been terrible.  I've had three orders so far.  The first two arrived late, and the third was cancelled on me completely.

Headline: The delivery is great
Review: The delivery is great!  Packing is very good.   Your food is good.  I find that there is a too much sauce on the entrees  and not enough vegetables as a side dish.

Headline: Factor meals have made us sick multiple‚Ä¶
Review: Factor meals have made us sick multiple times, not just on the recalls. It's a disgusting that you can barely even refund the meals. You are lucky I don't have the time to sue you!! Time off work! The pain we endured!

Headline: I have had no issues and the food is‚Ä¶
Review: I have had no issues and the food is tasty and convenient!

Headline: Box arrived late with only half of my‚Ä¶
Review: Box arrived late with only half of my order with no explanation or update. I was only refunded a fraction of the amount. I received only half but was not refunded half.

Headline: The food is convenient and tastes great!
The wrong meals were delivered (I‚Ä¶
Review: The wrong meals were delivered (I picked meals and then the default meals were sent - most with pork and beef which I don't eat - there is no way to change your settings for only chicken and fish). Some were good but some weren't. It's convenient but I can't eat it everyday. They get boring fast. Better than TV dinners but unfortunately the meal prep ones are much better (just take time).

Headline: So these are fantastic choices!!‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
Review: So these are fantastic choices!!‚Ä¶ but‚Ä¶..   The amount of fat, saturated fat and sodium needs to be adjusted.  We are older in our 60‚Äôs and like to cut those things, especially the fats and sodium really need to go.  We would order much more cuz they are great for our busy lifestyle but just cannot take the fat and sodium content levels.

Headline: Great product
Review: Great product. 2 mins in the microwave and happiness begins. Each meal has been fantastic at a terrific price.

Headline: Yummy...
Review: Every meal I have had has been very tasty and portions were ideal. I am saving an hour a day by utilizing these meals. Especially, as a single man cooking a meal for one person is difficult.

Headline: Delayed orders everytime
Review: They listen to reviews! Completely refunded me because I was not satisfied with my order which I will be using for my next box.

Headline: I only received 7 of 12 dinners
Review: I only received 7 of 12 dinners. Only 5 were correct. It was also a day late.

Headline: The services are really great
Review: The services are really great. The meals seem to be tasty and have been a hit with the family members for lunch.

Headline: Just to expensive for our budget & then‚Ä¶
Review: Just to expensive for our budget & then you add the delivery fee.

Headline: I would prefer to review after more‚Ä¶
Review: I would prefer to review after more experience.  So far, I  have had 3 shipments of 2 meals each for 2 people.  They have been well-packaged and delivered, fresh, and reasonably tasty.  Some of them have been a bit too bland for our taste.  There seems to be a lot of chicken offered - not a problem, but I would like to see more vegetarian options.

Headline: Very tasty!
Review: I've tried a few meal prep plans and Factor is by far the most tasty!

Headline: Every meal has been good land the right‚Ä¶
Review: Every meal has been good and the right portion

Headline: I didn‚Äôt get one of my meals
Review: I didn‚Äôt get one of my meals. Only got 3 of the 4.

Headline: Food is so good
Review: Food is so good, im a big guy and this helps me stay on portion size. I actually stopped eating out due to Factor. Their food tastes great and its so quick to make. I prefer the factor meals and their veriety to anything else now.

Headline: Missing meals
Review: I just subscribed a month ago, and the last 2 weeks, meals were missing in the boxes. If this continues, I will be unsubscribing and trying a different company.

Headline: Baking Instructions Need Tweaking
Review: Overall, the food is great and the delivery is perfect. There are a few things that could use a little improvement.1. I'd like to know what kind of oven you're using to say 4 minutes at 375F is enough to warm a meal. Granted I have a small (24") electric stove/oven, but 4 minutes isn't even close, and that is AFTER pre-heating. As of today, I've extended my baking time to 15 minutes, AND covering the cooking dish with foil, and I still had to give it 30 seconds in the microwave to warm it completely. 4 minutes is highly unrealistic.2. You should also state in your instructions to rearrange the ingredients in the package before putting it into the oven for more even baking. Also, the suggestion of a foil cover wouldn't hurt.Outside of that, great job!

Headline: Easy
Review: Easy! They taste wonderful and fresh!

Headline: Lost 80 pounds over the pandemic
Review: Lost 80 pounds over the pandemic. (Could still lose a few more.) Did it all through diet. (Too arthritic for exercise.) Did it by reducing caloric intake to 1000 calories a day for about 6 months. It was awful. Only found a few frozen meals that I could tolerate and the repetition grew so boring and blah. These meals remind me of that point in the Wizard of Oz where it goes from black and white to color. Just night and day. My taste buds are so happy these days and I‚Äôm maintaining my weight at the same time! So happy and satisfied. It‚Äôs a bit more in $ than I‚Äôm used to spending but it‚Äôs so worth it!

Headline: The choices and quality of the food is‚Ä¶
Review: The choices and quality of the food is fantastic! My husband loves it!

Headline: Least Reliable Meal Delivery Service I have used
Review: This is the third meal delivery service that I have tried and it has been the most inconsistent by far. I have been trying out Factor for about a month now, and have  yet to receive an on time delivery. My meals always come at least one day later than the date selected through my plan (sometimes two or three days later), which obviously makes meal planning impossible. One time, I only received half of my order and instead of refunding me for the missing meals, they just credited my account.I wish I could be giving this service a higher rating because if they could get things figured out, it would probably be my favorite service. The meals all taste great and not having to spend time cooking is very convenient. There are also a lot of options for all kinds of different dietary preferences. Unfortunately the inconsistently and unreliability makes it my least favorite.

Headline: On time delivery and awesome quality of‚Ä¶
Review: On time delivery and awesome quality of the food

Headline: Shorted Meals
Review: Food is delicious! However, I only got 2 of my 6 meals this past week! It would be better to give me a "heads up" before delivery! Thankfully, I  was credited for the missing meals!

Headline: Meals were not very good
Review: Meals were not very good, and too similar. Some weeks would be like 90% chicken meals for meals that had at least 500 calories. Meals were not enough calories for the price, and it seemed like the meals with higher calories just had sauces with a bunch of fats and sugars

Headline: Deceitful business practice
Review: I just got charged for $75 for food I didn‚Äôt order. The food I received in my first order tasted OK. My problem is that I received my first order on a Tuesday.  My husband and I ate our meals on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. I canceled my subscription on Saturday because I didn‚Äôt like the food that much. It was not obvious to me that I had to literally to cancel on the day after my first order was delivered, to prevent being charged for a second order. I believe this way of doing business is not upfront and honest since they don‚Äôt even give you a chance to eat the food in your first order, before you have to decide whether you want to cancel your second order. They should have included a giant notice in the box that says CANCEL TOMORROW! if you don‚Äôt want to be charged for a second order. Very deceitful business practice!

Headline: e service is very good and the food‚Ä¶
Review: The service is very good and the food is awesome üëå It always gets here on time and always the amount of meals that I wanted.Each day I get a different meal and a different taste. Had to slow it down a little though because I couldn't eat that fast.All and all it is wonderful not to have to cook all the time. I'm happy üòä

Headline: Not good value, deceptive business model
Review: Overall good tasting food (2 stars) but very small portions. Not good value for the price. Also, only had one week where all of the meals ordered got delivered. And they do not refund it back to your credit card. They credit the next week‚Äôs order to keep you ordering. Deceptive business model. I cancelled after four weeks.

Headline: Great food
Review: Great food, arrived chilled as expected

Headline: The Delivery process is excellent from‚Ä¶
Review: The Delivery process is excellent from drop off to packaging of items and communication regarding shipping and delivery. I would expect that paying $10.99 for shipping. I really feel like if you are spending over $100 in food that shipping should be free.I will also say that after getting a free box from someone there was no way to get our military discount applied to future boxes I learned. When I called customer service regarding this, they were nice but unhelpful. The meals have been mostly good but I can tell I will get tired of them each week, so have taken a little break. The company makes it easy to skip boxes which is great for flexibility.

Headline: Repeatedly Disappointing
Review: Orders are almost always missing meals, food has made me sick on more than one occasion.

Headline: Delicious meals
Review: I have had 3 box‚Äôs and every meal has been delicious !!

Headline: On time
Review: On time! Careful with box.

Headline: Food is very good
Review: Food is very goodJust have to remember to select choicesIt starts to get a bit pricey the further you go with deliveries

Headline: Great meals
Review: Great meals, very delicious,my kids have even enjoyed them! I had a delivery issue and the problem was resolved right away.

Headline: I‚Äôve done every other product like this‚Ä¶
Review: I‚Äôve done every other product like this on the market. From Seattle Suttons to Nutrisysyem. The Factor food tastes amazing! They get it to me timely every week, I don‚Äôt have to pick it up. It tastes fresh but not like ‚Äúdiet food.‚Äù

Headline: Food is great and easy to use app
There is not much of a variety.
Review: There is not much of a variety.Everything seems to taste the same.

Headline: Canceled my order
Review: Canceled my order. No communication

Headline: Love the food but customer service wasn‚Äôt the best.
Review: I am dieting and ordered  six meals but received five. I now need to go to the store  to buy food for the meal I didn‚Äôt receive. When I called they refunded my money but that was it. I would have appreciated some type of compensation for their mistake but instead was left feeling unhappy at end of the conversation.

Headline: Overall good
Review: Overall, the meals have been very tasty and meat. My leaves in regards to nutrition. I was very concerned about receiving meals with uncooked chicken

Headline: Green beans are always tough and
Review: Green beans are always tough and. Fibrous

Headline: Overall the food is delicious but I‚Ä¶
