Headline: Paid for four boxes
Review: Paid for four boxes, received one. Although I love the meals, the delivery is certainly questionable.

Headline: Great quality
Review: The meals have all been really good. We just had one issue with an order missing meals.  I wish we would have been notified right away that it was an ingredient shortage instead of having to call.  Customer service was great and refunded us the money.  Overall we have been very happy with the quality of food and the delivery (packaging and drivers).

Headline: I was sent a bunch of weird dinners and‚Ä¶
Review: I was sent a bunch of weird dinners and lunches that I would never eat like pork as I‚Äôm Jewish and when I called customer service they told me I missed cut off for ordering so they send random junk rather than basing my order of my previous order history‚Ä¶ epic FAIL

Headline: Not happy; cancelled prior to end of discounts.
Review: Delivery is sloppy (far from door) and box is very heavy; limited meal choices with predominantly chicken menu and all steak dishes require a fee equal to the regular meal cost and the steaks are well-done/overcooked.  Broccoli and green beans are the prevalent vegetable.  Overall much too expensive for what you get.

Headline: food is mostly consistently good albeit‚Ä¶
Review: food is mostly consistently good albeit very small portions. One chicken meal in particular was like eating rubber. I'd continue with Factor if their prices were a little lower..once you add in the shipping without any discounts it's expensive per meal.

Headline: This box was the second in the last two‚Ä¶
Review: This box was the second in the last two weeks that said it was delivered, but was not. When I contacted customer support I was told it wasn‚Äôt delivered, because it was damaged by the courier. It would be nice if the app would automatically say that instead of saying it was delivered. It would also be nice if factor could figure out how to keep this from happening.

Headline: Food is average at best
Review: Food is average at best. Veggie chopped very small or under cooked.

Headline: FAIL-- 2 out of 8 items delivered with no notice
Review: By and large tasty food, BUT customer service is in the toilet and they are failing to deliver orders.  Last week they were a day late AND this week 2 our of 8 items arrived. After 3 attempts calling customer service and a total of nearly an hour on hold i was first told " your order shows not delivered be patient."  THEN when i got another agent was told " oh yes we ran out of food that's all you get this week."  NO advance notice.  and a compensation offer of $18.  Ha.

Headline: The meals are tasty
Review: The meals are tasty, and the selection of breakfast items is improving. Packaging works very well and shipments arrive on time.However, I've had repeated issues with missing or expired add-on juice shots and smoothies.

Headline: Delivery is unreliable
Review: The meals are good and filling.  I have lost some weight using this meal service.  I‚Äôm only giving them 3 stars because delivery is unreliable.  I have come to expect at least one missing meal per delivery.  Most recently, half of the meals were missing for the week.  Such an inconvenience which throws off meal planning for the week.01/17/2024 update - Delivery continues to remain a problem and seems to be escalating. Half of the meals, the breakfasts, and an add-on were missing from this week‚Äôs delivery.   The company reached out to me after my initial post and issued an additional refund.  While money is always appreciated, it compounded concerns that I already had with a lack of transparency in the company‚Äôs billing, refund, and credit practices.  The company does not routinely issue receipts or invoices.  After an order is placed, it is very difficult to track the value of meals ordered and refunds and credits can seem arbitrary for missing items.  It is very difficult to verify whether the company has actually issued a credit or a refund for the money paid for missing items.Downgrading my rating due to these issues.

Headline: Meals are expensive
Review: Meals are expensive. Most have very high sodium content but food does taste great

Headline: 4 out of 5 boxes have had issues
Review: 4 out of 5 boxes have had issues. Broken seals, missing meals, recalled meals, out of stock meals. The food is really good, but I do wish there was better consistency in their service. Giving credits for these errors is a nice gesture but not when you aren‚Äôt allowed to use them on anything but a full priced box. For the cost, the service could be a lot better

Headline: Everything comes packaged safely and‚Ä¶
Review: Everything comes packaged safely and cold. Ready to eat!

Headline: The website kept messing up and the‚Ä¶
Review: The website kept messing up and the customer service kept blaming me.

Headline: more beef and pork‚Ä¶
Review: Please include more beef and pork tenderloin meals!

Headline: The chat bot supposedly transferred me‚Ä¶
Review: The chat bot supposedly transferred me to a live agent but whoever I chatted with after being transferred clearly was not reading my messages before replying, or they were canned replies that didn‚Äôt pertain to my situation, as the transcript will show

Headline: The foods good and always arrives cold
Review: The foods good and always arrives still cold which is surprising ans the whole process is nicely automated. The only two complaints I would have is that I wish I could permanently set it to not allow it to pick certain meals and a bit more variety in the meals available would never hurt.

Headline: Food is very good.
Review: Food is very good mostly. Love the convenience. My only complaint is that I tried to skip a week of meals but I got a week of meals anyway. Then meals stopped for two weeks. Couldn't reach Factor. Back on track now.

Headline: Delivery was on time
Review: Delivery was on time; food was cold and everything I ordered was delivered.

Headline: My experience with Factor 75 so far
Review: First, I'll start with what is good.  The food is delicious, while some more variety would be nice (they tend to have mostly the same recipes every week), it's very good.  Now for the bad.  I have now had five boxes delivered.  First two went well. The third was missing 1/2 of the meals and the subsequent two boxes were missing one meal.  While customer service credited me right away, the fact that I've had missing meals in 3 of my 5 boxes is a problem.  According to CS, they wait until all of the orders are in before they source the ingredients.  If that is the case, there should never be meals not delivered because there aren't enough ingredients.  It seems they have issues with both the people sourcing the ingredients and those packing the boxes.  I'll give it another two weeks, if I'm missing meals, I'll have to discontinue and find another company.

Headline: Aside from getting violently sick from‚Ä¶
Review: Aside from getting violently sick from the undercooked chicken, I've happy with the product

Headline: Two meal were delivered in bad‚Ä¶
Review: Two meal were delivered in bad condition; tray broken and food spilling out. Credit was given but no replacement. The rest were good

Headline: Multiple shipments with damaged meals
Review: Multiple shipments with damaged meals, missing meals, recalls, I‚Äôm really disappointed and unhappy and frustrated with this service. It doesn‚Äôt feel reliable, looking for another company.

Headline: Lack of customer support
Review: Lack of customer support. Was not helpful at all in trying to fix a problem. I understand the situation I was in and realize that I had missed the deadline to skip, however it was Christmas and no one was going to be able to pick up the food. Factor was ready to let the food sit outside for 10 days instead of donating or canceling the order.

Headline: Food is OK
Review: Food is OK. The mashed potatoes are filled with water and the sides are very limited. So far all I've received are green beans and mashed potatoes. They don't offer much more as far as sides go.

Headline: Food was enjoyed and met my protein abd‚Ä¶
Review: Food was enjoyed and met my protein abd calorie goals.

Headline: Great customer service
Review: The food is absolutely delicious. Plus, any issues I had were met with very good customer service!

Headline: My most recent box was missing 7 of the‚Ä¶
Review: My most recent box was missing 7 of the 12 meals. I appreciate the responsive customer care team, yet I am EXTREMELY frustrated with Factor. Four of my most recent orders have been missing meals or have had complete incorrect meals. I have reduced utilization of the service drastically and am considering canceling despite loving the food. It is MAJOR inconvenience to have to call customer service after EVERY order.  Give an extra star because the food is excellent and options are plentiful‚Ä¶..if you get what you ordered.

Headline: Absolutely delicious
Review: The food has always came fresh and is absolutely delicious!

Headline: The food is great
Review: The food is great. The only thing I would change is being able to pick your sides

Headline: I save alot of time and the meals are‚Ä¶
Review: I save alot of time and the meals are delicious and just the right portions for me.

Headline: The best experience with Factors
Review: The food is fresh and delicious, the portions are perfect, even the delivery is always on time, I am so thankful for choosing Factor 75.

Headline: 4 weeks of disappointment.
Review: Of the 4 weeks of deliveries, 1 of the meals was not what was in the sleeve/package ingredients the other 3 weeks Each week one of the meals was css as cancelled. Yes I was given a refund and a $5 credit one I can understand but every week is too much I can report that the did issue a credit for the additional 3rd missing meal and the one that was mislabeled. The meals in general are good both taste and filling. It just appears they have some supply growth issues at this time which I hope get worked out.because they do have a great product.

Headline: The process of ordering and choosing‚Ä¶
Review: The process of ordering and choosing was straight forward. However, while the food was good, I wouldn't call it healthy as most meals are very high in fats, cholesterol, and/or sodium. It would be great if heart healthy options were available.

Headline: They didn‚Äôt deliver my meals! They have logistics issues!
Review: Yall got your money and didn‚Äôt even deliver my meals! I tried calling customer service and the guy simply said (here‚Äôs $10 in your account) I paid 171 dollars for my meals. Horrible customer service and such a bad image on yall! Terrible experience!!!! Apparently they have delivery issues and if you want to rely on your meals to be delivered then DO NOT go with factor!

Headline: Easy and tasty!
Review: I‚Äôve been purchasing Factor going on 4 weeks.  Everything arrived on the day I specified except for Christmas and New Year. But Factor let us know in plenty of time. Meals take 2 minutes to heat in microwave without getting mushy or dried out. Taste good too without being over salted or spiced. It‚Äôs a little expensive but no cooking, no washing up! As a 7yr old grandmother, I‚Äôm done with cooking and cleaning up!

Headline: A year-long customer didn't mean much to them.
Review: I was a customer for over a year before canceling. Their food quality and portions has diminished over the past year. My last order with them only included 4 of the 10 meals I paid for. Don't get scammed by this company.Update: Factor credited me for half the order, even though they delivered less than half of the food. I still stand by my original review.

Headline: Convenient Meal Service
Review: Factor has been a convenience to my boyfriend and I. We never have time to cook throughout the week and Factor meals save us from needing to buy food from restaurants everyday. Delivery has always come on time. We did receive 17 meals instead of 18 the first week, but customer service refunded me for the missing meal and has been very responsive whenever we have issues. The second week we received 16 instead of 18 because the meals we picked ran out, but again we were refunded and they gave us a $5 voucher for the inconvenience. Overall, the meals taste good, better than 3 other meal prep services I've used previously.Note: My original review complained about the missing meals, but I wrote it before I saw the message that we were being compensated. Customer service is great with Factor.

Headline: Great food
Review: Great food. Descent portions

Headline: HORRIBLE
Review: HORRIBLE! They allow you to skip just a few weeks at a time and then will automatically charge you if you don‚Äôt keep logging in to skip meals. You cant temporarily disable unless you want to deactivate your account altogether. The day they charge your card, you cannot call to get a refund. They do not offer that like other companies. They also don‚Äôt send you an email that your card has been charged. They do send upcoming order emails a few days prior even when you skip those weeks. Additionally, you are not allowed to select your delivery date. If you attempt to dispute the charge, you will still get it charged back to your credit card. Lastly, the meals are good but several give you really bad heartburn as myself and several of my friends with no previous heartburn issues would get it. You also can‚Äôt have saved settings on types of foods you can‚Äôt or won‚Äôt eat such as seafood, pork, etc. They are only getting 2 stars because the meals at least tasted good, but I‚Äôd probably rate them a 1.5 star rating. Their customer service and business policies are subpar and not in line with other meal delivery companies. To me their practices come across as unethical and they are quite a bit more in costs compared to their competitors.

Headline: No order
Review: Never received my order called twice and they said it was coming and that they would call me after 8pm to make sure I got the order never called me now it‚Äôs supposed to come tomorrow just kept getting the run around

Headline: Would not recommend!
Review: We ordered 12 meals for the first 2 weeks with no problems, then last week we only received 7 meals in the package with no explanation or anything, yet, I was still charged for the 12 meals so I contacted customer service and they agreed to give me a refund and said it would take a few days to process. I went ahead and gave them another chance and this week I received 8 out of 12 meals I was charged for, and once again, no explanation. I contacted customer service to ask about my refund from last week because it hadn't gone through and they had no idea what I was talking about even though I spoke to their own customer service chat before. So they processed the refund and then were trying to give me a credit for the 4 missing from this week. Absolutely terrible experience with this company so far.

Headline: The meals and customer service were‚Ä¶
Review: The meals and customer service were great, but I ordered 3 boxes and every week there were meals missing. It was very disappointing and time consuming considering every week I had to call customer service to address these issues. I cancelled my account after the 3rd week.

Headline: Food is delicious and extremely easy to‚Ä¶
Review: Food is delicious and extremely easy to heat up. Incredible variety, too!

Headline: Love your food but too much at one time.
Pathetic, Horrible....From the start
Review: Horrible from the start. App was quirky. Chose my meals, saved and reviewed only to see that it replaced my selected meals with the originals it picked for me. No place to state food allergies or preferences.  I didn't receive one email from the company, even the receipt for my 1st box. I had to go to my online banking app to see if I was charged.  I kept telling app I was having difficulty and asked it to verify email and resend and still have not received 1 email.Today my 1st box showed up. I ordered 6 meals for the week as I am a busy professional. 2 of the meals were premium and I paid extra for them. The app shows the box was delivered and then showed what items were in the box.  I was shorted 4 meals, 2 of which were the premium meals. Now I have only 2 meals for the rest of a very busy week where I had not planned on cooking! I called customer service. Waited 20 minutes on hold, only to be told that I would not receive the 4 meals because the way the company works is, its too late to give me my meals as shipments already went out. What a crock! I was offered a credit to go towards next week, but after speaking with a very nice, but very difficult to understand, and inexperienced agent, I decided to cancel.  Then she told me it would take 10-12 business days to get my refund! Ridiculous.  They charged me as soon as I signed up.If there quality control for packing a box is this bad, I can only imagine how their food handling is. I have not tasted either of the 2 meals I did receive today, but I can tell you that neither look like the picture on the box. The chicken breast dinner I received may be a chicken breast but it is diced up and not a chicken breast intact. Ridiculous.  Hello Fresh bought this company for 277 million dollars. You would think they would be better than this. I guess this is why it takes so long to get your money back.

Headline: The meals are so fresh taste amazing!
Review: The meals are so fresh taste great!

Headline: I love the Factor meals
Review: I love the Factor meals!  they are all delicious.

Headline: Factor 100%!
Review: Efficient and accurate delivery each time.Customer service is good too.

Headline: An easy way to get prepared meals delivered
Review: Factor is a good option if you don't have the time or capability to cook meals yourself. It is more expensive than frozen meals from the grocery store, but fresher than them as well.

Headline: Easy to use
Review: The food is good and definitely very convenient, saves me so much time on meal prep and has a big variety of options. The price is expensive though and for many people I think the portion is too small for them. It worked for me though.

Headline: The food is really good.
Review: I've found all of the food I've received has been good and it tastes fresh. Better than other meal delivery services I have tried in the past.

Headline: NO quality control: Missing meals, hair in food, etc
Review: I liked Factor the first week I tried it. However, they have really gone down hill recently. They need QUALITY CONTROL. My husband and I usually get two of the same dishes to eat together, and the protein portions are always drastically different between one and the other. Recently, we were missing 3 of our meals from our box, and they were only going to refund us $18, even though half of our box was missing. They did give a better refund when I reached out. Then, in our last box there was a hair in one of the meals. We are DONE with Factor.

Headline: The green beans were stringy and tough
Review: The green beans were stringy and tough. Pork was very fatty and tough.

Headline: It‚Äôs ok.
Review: Most meals are pretty good.  What is irritating is the missing meals, due to forgotten or missing seasoning.  Also, a lot of the meals I would like to try are always sold out.

Headline: The food is very good and easy to‚Ä¶
Review: The food is very good and easy to prepare

Headline: Terrible Experience
Review: Terrible customer service  all my orders was delivered wrong - I called multiple times and spent so much time of the phone - complaining about it . And after all , they kept sending me 18 meals a week - and I just order 8 every other week . Also they delivered a completely different menu - not the one I choose . They sent me pork and pasta -

Headline: Bigger Portion size options
Review: The meals are very tasty and I would like to see a couple of portion sizes sold.   My husband is 6'2" and 250pds.  The meals don't quite meet his appetite lol.

Headline: The best
Review: The best! Love it!

Headline: Canceled due to multiple broken meals.
Missing 5 meals from my box!
Review: Factor Team reached out after and made things right. Most recent box on 1/16 was right and I was credited for the missing meals.Missing 5 meals from my box! No notification and constantly disconnected from queue and had to call back in to actually get a customer service person on phone.

Headline: food has been awesome, just one hiccup
Review: The food has been awesome. Well seasoned and the quality of the meats has been excellent.  Deliveries come cold as they should.  My only issue which is kind of a big one is the Monday delivery. I leave for work at 5:15am.  I am not comfortable holding a mealOver the weekend to have the following monday. I will likely be cutting down to 4 meals as to not waste money on the extra meal.  Also, At first I thought it was expensive but considering how good the food has been I‚Äôm happy with the price.

Headline: Fantastic Factor Food
Review: Fantastic Factor Food!  The communication about orders is first rate!

Headline: Beware
Review: Beware! I do not recommend doing business with Factor. Factor will charge you for simply creating an account to view their menu. By doing so, you will apparently automatically place an order. So even if you immediately "cancel your plan" and get an email confirmation like I did, they will send you food and charge and refuse to refund you.

Headline: We Love the Meals We Get from Factor!
Review: We love the meals we get from Factor.  We are older seniors, and it is so nice not to have to COOK every day of the week.  We each pick 4 meals each week, so that only leaves three days a week to actually cook a meal from scratch.  We do prefer our veggies cooked a bit more, so we like to microwave the meals for 3 minutes, rather than the two minutes suggested by Factor.

Headline: Great all around!
Review: Deliveries are made on time, and the quality and general taste of the food is some of the best that I've had from meal delivery service like Factor. The variety and choices a great so I don't feel bored. And most importantly it's gotten me through a rough holiday season.

Headline: Love the experience so far
Review: Love the experience so far. I have only had one meal that I hated. Not their fault, I just didn't like it. I am on my 4th box now.

Headline: Need greater variety
Review: Need more choices and greater variety.  Too many things with shredded meats.  Portion sizes vary.The filet mignon once heated was medium well.  So did not enjoy especially at extra $12Overall very good though.  Very tasty.

Headline: Great taste, not the best ingredients
Review: Love the flavors and varieties of meals, but I wish there wasn‚Äôt so much cheap seed oils in the ingredients. It really messes with hormones and is terrible for you, and a big health difference between cooking at home versus eating out is that you can choose to use olive oil for example instead of sunflower seed oil etc. so this service is disappointing in that respect.

Headline: Overall good company!
Review: The meals were tasty, quick to make and packaged nicely. The communications between Factor and me were clear, timely, and easy to understand. It was easy to cancel weeks though slightly challenging for to change the number of meals delivered. You can only cancel one week at a time as far as I could figure out.

Headline: Missing meals, frozen, vomiting
Review: Disappointed that two of my meals were missing. I was never told that they would be. I just came back to Factor after having been with Cook Unity. I left Cook Unity because it was the same food week after week and they put MSG in some of their meals.My factor meals were also frozen which they say they never are. After eating the first meal  I vomited multiple times.

Headline: Easy to use website and app
Review: Easy to use website and app. Got my first order done easily and get regular email reminders to update my menu for the next week if desired. Couldn‚Äôt be easier. Meals are good and selection is good.

Headline: Perfectly portioned, healthy, and delcious
Review: I've tried a lot of subscription meal services as I'm a single female, no children, with an extremely demanding job. I always preferred ones with little prep. I had been noticing a lot of inconsistencies with them and decided to give Factor a try. I've used it for about a month now and I've enjoyed every meal. Even the ones that I thought wouldn't be my favorites turned out to be great. The meats are tender which is not a usual thing when it comes to these subscription services. The meals are completed and ready to heat and eat, so I don't have to worry about wasting time I don't have each day. The variety each week in choosing meals is nice and I find myself trying to eliminate excess meals to stay within my box limit. A limit that I set for myself, of course, as factor allows you to add meals to your weekly boxes if you'd like.   They have been consistent and that is something I appreciate. This isn't just a good fit for a single, busy person. I have friends with large families that want something like this for lunch meals to take away some of the cooking stress.

Headline: Not for me
Review: Selecting weekly meals was convenient, and I appreciated the reminders from Factor regarding meal options and delivery notifications.Food quality was okay but not great.  The level of salt was reasonable, if not a bit light, which is a good thing.I decided to discontinue my subscription in an effort to reduce the amount of single-use plastic in my household (each meal comes in a plastic tray with plastic film covering), and I didn't feel like the meals were any more healthy than what I prepare at home.  My family of three never made it through the 6 meals in our weekly deliveries, and the price for 4 meals was higher than I want to pay.

Headline: Food was good
Review: Food was good. Shipping/delivery was an issue. 2nd box arrived a day late. 3rd box arrived a day late and missing a meal. 4th box never arrived and that's when I canceled.  Edited 1/10/24 to add: Factor issued a refund for the credit they had applied to as future box, which I appreciate.

Headline: The food is great and ready to eat in‚Ä¶
Review: The food is great and ready to eat in minutes

Headline: Second to NONE
Review: Well seasoned; never frozen; clear labeling; bespoke packaging; immense variety; incredible ingredients; surprisingly affordable; highly recommended.

Headline: Missing Meals
Review: The food itself is very tasty.  However, 2nd box was missing a meal and the chicken entrees were undercooked and had to be thrown away.  3rd box was missing a meal again.  Reached out and they were going to credit me back the $46.00 for the missing meals and ones I couldn‚Äôt eat becuase I was cancelling.  Instead they credited me $16 and did not cancel as they said they would.

Headline: Don't use factor
Review: Don't use factor. they use a delivery company called Veho. They will open your boxes and take meals from them. and when you complain about them they will magically lose your package. or bump up by 1 day your delivery date by making sure your delivery spoils. and then tell you it can't be delivered because of food safety. So at this point, I've had 21 meals not delivered in 1 month. also when they give you credit you can't use it until your promo runs out. and the promo is like 10 weeks. it's sad because I had a lot of coworkers at Wego ask me about Factor_. and after a month I told them to look elsewhere. the delivery company Veho is what holds Factor_ back. I've closed my account. and I'm not going to use them again. I'm sure this will not make it to their customer reviews. but I just had to write it.

Headline: I have to contact customer service‚Ä¶
Review: I have to contact customer service weekly with issues. Coupons not applied, damaged meals, delayed deliveries. The food is pretty delicious but theres a ton of hoops and baggage for it and its not worth the high price tag.

Headline: Great food
Review: Great food. Very flavorful.

Headline: My husband and I have been really‚Ä¶
Review: My husband and I have been really impressed with the quality of the food and have ordered 3x. However I had to put 4 stars instead of 5 because in our last order the chicken for 2 of the meals were undercooked. I filled out a form about it but never heard back.

Headline: Enjoyed Factor
Review: All my meals were delicious and delivered in a timely manner. They were good portion sizes for dinner and healthy.

Headline: 3 of the breakfast i ordered not in box‚Ä¶
Review: 3 of the breakfast i ordered not in box and they said they ran out got a refund but it sucks got the food to save time not i spent the morning talking to them and i wont eat till tonight because ill be busy

Headline: The food is amazingly delicious and the‚Ä¶
Review: The food is amazingly delicious and the ease of preparation is what is a winner for us!!

Headline: Great but expensive!
Review: I love the meals, but this is very expensive and many cannot afford this option. The meals are great for people that can afford them.

Headline: Always skeptical on taste, but these were amazing
Review: Always skeptical on taste, but dang these are good.  Levels of flavor you normally don't expect except for homemade.

Headline: Great choices for food options
Review: Great choices for food options! Quality of food is great!Easy ordering!

Headline: Great dinners and delivered on time
I like the convenience of the meal‚Ä¶
Review: I like the convenience of the meal being ready for me.

Headline: Average flavor
Review: The flavors of the meals are very average. The portions are also rather meager. The meals are not impressive. Many of the meals every week have the same ingredients. There is very little variety with meat selection. And this is not a new thing. These comments I have after eating every meal over the last several weeks.

Headline: The food is awesome totally worth the‚Ä¶
Review: The food is awesome totally worth the price. The heating instructions are terrible some means I have to microwave 6 minutes some 4 some 12 it all depends . That is my only complaint ! Everything else is exceptional!!

Headline: Meal delivery A+
Review: Well proportioned meals.  Great flavor.  Good price.  Excellent choices

Headline: good tasting
Review: good tasting, however, not east to adjust quanity.

Headline: Great tasting meals.
Review: Here meals taste great. I tried about 10 different ones and all were awesome and fresh. Great macros and portion sizes if you are into that.

Headline: Perfect for my schedule
Review: I really enjoy these meals and love that I have something delicious and nutritious waiting for me after work. 6 boxes a week is perfect for me!

Headline: A little over priced for the portion‚Ä¶
Review: A little over priced for the portion size, but does taste great

Headline: Wrapping is extremely difficult to‚Ä¶
Review: Wrapping is extremely difficult to open.  I believe I have already canceled my subscription, if not, please cancel.  Thank you, Maureen Charneco

Headline: Tastes Great, not great for dieters
Review: The food tastes wonderful. I haven't had one meal in three weeks that I haven't loved.unfortunately, I'm trying to lose weight and the meals are very high in fat, and unsaturated fat as well. I will have to cancel.

Headline: Up until the third week,,,
Review: Up until the third week, we were very happy with the quality and variety.  Then you start to see the same meals over and over.   I had a chicken dish last night for dinner that I could not eat, the chicken tasted like something out of the freezer.

Headline: Unreliable
Review: For 3 weeks in a row, my box has been missing meals. First 1 meals, the next week 2 meals, and this week 4 meals. We get 8 meals in our box so that‚Äôs half the box we‚Äôre now short. We rely on your meals for ease of the work week and now will need to figure out and plan other meals due to this. Highly unreliable.

Headline: Win win
Review: My husband if over the moon with these meals!   Consistent quality and amazing taste for him‚Ä¶. And I don‚Äôt have to cook after a long day at work.  Win win!

Headline: The food tastes great but I keep‚Ä¶
Review: The food tastes great but I keep getting extremely worrying emails that "this food wasn't prepared correctly or this wasn't done correctly" so on and so forth also there's no option for allergies I can't eat mushrooms so if I don't notice them on a meal I have to throw away that portion.

Headline: Bad service, but excellent food.
Review: The food is excellent! The customer service, billing, delivery had not been.  My first box arrived as planned, the 2nd box never showed up and they said it was lost or damaged in transit. The 3rd box, I received the same notice. They hav not been to responsive to my emails and can not contact them via phine.  My first few boxes were heavily discounted with the promotional plan, and now I lost the discount because the boxes were undeliverable. Again, food is amazing, service not so much.

Headline: So convenient
Review: Good food, love the convienience of a 2 minute meal. Very happy so far.

Headline: Great Experience
Review: We have enjoyed all of our meals. It is so nice to not have to worry about grocery shopping, cleaning, and cooking. We have tasty fresh meals in just 2 minutes.

Headline: Some too spicy
Review: Some too spicy, some gave me diarrhea. I had to throw a lot out. Not a good experience. I have asked to have it dropped.

Headline: Regularly missing an item
Review: I like the food, but 2 out of 5 deliveries now have had a missing item without notice. No heads up or option to substitute. This defeats the purpose of to your door meal prep because now I have to go out to the store, after paying a delivery fee to Factor, to substitute the items I‚Äôm missing. I‚Äôll be shopping around for new services

Headline: Tasty and delivered on time!
Review: Always delivered on time and have enjoyed most of the meals. Love the premade smoothies! Saves me time.

Headline: Disappointing.
Review: So far I have had two shipments. And both shipments have had missing meals. I have cancelled.

Headline: Delicious food
Review: Delicious food. Easy process to pick from many options

Headline: It is simply out of my budget
Review: It is simply out of my budget. The food is just ok for the cost

Headline: It really is two minutes!!
Review: It really is no prep and two minutes in the microwave on high and boom, dinner! Great quality and delicious.

Headline: I had the filet mignon steak and wild‚Ä¶
Review: I had the filet mignon steak and wild mushrooms today.im not really a steak guy and it was delicious.

Headline: Not Great
Review: Meals can be expensive. They‚Äôre also very hit or miss. Some are delicious while other are not that great at all. Meals have been missing. And I‚Äôm still hungry after most meals. Honestly not worth the price.

Headline: Great with communication
Review: Great with communication. If delivery needs to be pushed back or if there aren‚Äôt enough ingredients to prepare a meal they let you know right away. So far it‚Äôs always been delivered on time and meals are great.

Headline: The entrees are ok, vegs are bad
Review: The entrees are ok in size and taste. The sides are not worth it and the vegetables are soggy!  I will not continue these meals after this next delivery

Headline: Meals and Delivery good, WAY too many marketing emails
Review: The meals and delivery are very good, but the amount of emails and marketing blasts make it almost unbearable and not worth the convenience. At least one, often two or theee marketing emails A DAY since signing up. It‚Äôs legitimately SPAM and enough to turn me off of the convenience of the meal kits.

Headline: On receiving my first box of factor‚Ä¶
Review: On receiving my first box of factor there was a recall of items I had already eaten. I had eaten them thinking I‚Äôd messed up the cooking instructions because I was still new to the subscription, but was completely upset to learn that the reality was much worse than that. The food was actually not supposed to be eaten at all. I loved the honesty and transparency on the part of factor but I was told I‚Äôd be refunded for those meals and I don‚Äôt believe that has happened. They gave me chocolate in my next box, which was really sweet at face value, but cutting out sugar was my New Year‚Äôs resolutions so coming face to face with chocolate I did not order was actually quite vexing. I wish they had just threw in a double of a meal I‚Äôd already selected for my next box. The meals, besides the earlier hiccups, were very nice and the website offers a really good variety. Factor makes it possible to be healthy on the go and after a few boxes, I‚Äôll be honest I‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôll stay. I‚Äôll say it‚Äôs at the very least, worth a try!

Headline: Everyone should sign up!
Review: Fresh, nutritious, appropriately portioned, great variety, delivered to my door! No-brainer on what to fix each night!

Headline: Delicious taste and flavor.
Review: My husband and I like the Factor meals very much in regards to texture, flavor, and taste.  However, in regards to portion size, we think that the size of the meat is very good.  And the vegetable side portion is too small.

Headline: I haven't been able to choose my meals I goofed when I picked 10 meals. I can't eat that many in a 5 day period which I consider safe for food. For me, the seven meals you sent me would be better
Review: I haven't been able to choose my meals. I goofed

Headline: Very palet pleasing great value labor saving economically
Review: Very palet pleasing great value labor saving

Headline: Delicious Food!
Review: Great food! Always fresh since it‚Äôs never been frozen, and it tastes really good! They have healthy options too. The only reason I‚Äôm giving them a 4 star is because the portions are a bit too small. Other than that, it‚Äôs a great option!

Headline: The food is good
Review: The food is good. Every meal we've had, we loved. However had some hiccups in the delivery process. Two weeks in a row, some meals were missing from my order. I reached out to the company and they were apologetic and refunded and even added some credits to my account, which was nice.  So great customer service!   I will say, I signed up for factor looking for consistency in my meals. Hopefully the deliver issues are a thing of the past. If so, we will continue with Factor for the long haul.

Headline: Every single dish I tried is fantastic‚Ä¶
Review: Every single dish I tried is fantastic and very fresh. You can tell they use great ingredients, as my stomach never hurts, and I don't get any type of blooding. I appreciate their meals have a significant amount of vegetables, and all of their meats are juicy and have a great flavor. Plus, customer service is there for you, not to challenge you as if you were an enemy.

Headline: Food tastes great!
Review: Food tastes great. Deliveries are on time.

Headline: Food is delicious
Review: Food is delicious. Easy to prepare. Good quality. No issues with account or picking food or credits. All smooth.

Headline: Food is good only a few dishes I didn‚Äôt‚Ä¶
Review: Food is good only a few dishes I didn‚Äôt care for. Juices are great too (:

Headline: Food quality and ease of preparation‚Ä¶
Review: Food quality and ease of preparation are excellent. Every meal tried was delicious. Deciding on meals from the menu is easy and the choices on the menu are plentiful. Great experience overall.

Headline: I have really enjoyed every meal...
Review: I have really enjoyed every meal I have received so far.  You guys have me trying and loving vegetables that I would not normally eat.  Even the rest of my familiar enjoys them too and it is so convenient after working all day to heat up a delicious meal in 2-3 mins without having to plan, shop for, and prepare the meal.

Headline: Food is great but the box consistency‚Ä¶
Review: Food is great but the box consistency is horrible. I don‚Äôt even thing I‚Äôve had one full box. Out of 10 meals I get 5-7 of them. Which sucks because I depends on the food for work. Hoping it was just busy holiday nonsense and not the norm.  Food quality is great though

Headline: Food is tasty and perfectly portioned
Review: Food is tasty and perfectly portioned. I enjoy being able to choose what meals I want

Headline: Great experience!!!
Review: Great experience!!!! Operator heard my issue (3 incorrect orders), didn't keep me on call for long, and resolved the issue.

Headline: Perfect for busy seasons!
Review: Factor has been soooo helpful during this holiday/post-holiday/chaotic life changes situation season ü§™ I have barely had time to think straight let alone meal plan or prep so having these meals delivered automatically each week has saved my butt on more than one occasion! Typically when life gets busy for me like it has lately, I end up ordering out a lot and since I‚Äôve been trying to reign in my finances this has been a great solution. It‚Äôs more expensive than making everything myself to yield leftovers but it‚Äôs less expensive than ordering out so it‚Äôs a great balance between the two in my opinion. I would give 5 stars if there were gluten free meal options‚Ä¶not every meal has gluten but it would be nice if GF was one of the meal preference options since a couple people I know that I wanted to share it with have gluten intolerances. But so far I‚Äôve been happy with factor and have tried a lot of tasty meals that I wouldn‚Äôt have known about or how to make otherwise!

Headline: Meals have been real good
Review: Meals have been real good. A little too much chicken, which is my fault I love the ease of making a meal.

Headline: Your web site is very hard to use great‚Ä¶
Review: Your web site is very hard to use great food but to hard to make changes

Headline: Absolutely amazing
Review: Absolutely amazing! Cannot complain about any meal flavor or quality!

Headline: MISSING MEALS AND OUTSOURCED OVERSEAS OPERATORS‚Ä¶
Review: The last two orders items were missing...then called customer service...could not understand your outsourced overseas representative...get back to US folks

Headline: Good and Bad
Review: The meals were good. Chicken was recalled and most of my meals were chicken.

Headline: I am loving Factor
Review: I am loving Factor! The meals are delicious and there is no prep! Meals are ready to eat in just 2 minutes. I like the variety and look forward to choosing my meals each week.

Headline: Factor experience
Review: Most of the meals were very good. My issues were with the missing items because of an inventory issue and not being notified about the box coming without all the meals until after delivery. I also encountered an issue with having to throw meals out because of undercooked chicken. That was a little unnerving.

Headline: Always shows up on time
Review: Always shows up on time. Meals are great! Easy. Anything with the pastas have been over the top delicious.

Headline: I‚Äôm enjoying Factor but I see a lot of‚Ä¶
Review: I‚Äôm enjoying Factor but I see a lot of the same recipes, I‚Äôm afraid I‚Äôll get tired of the same foods.

Headline: Convenient Outstanding Healthy Food; What Could be Better?
Review: My Husband & I are into our 2nd month on F75 and are loving it! Saves so much time and it's really fun picking out our meals. Gone is the ever-present stress about "What are we going to have for dinner" we used to have every single night. The meals are super delicious; we truly haven't had one we didn't like. We feel great knowing we're eating unprocessed food. And the best part? I've lost 5 lbs in one month and the ONLY thing I've changed is I now have a F75 meal every night.

Headline: Difficult to bring food to proper‚Ä¶
Review: Difficult to bring food to proper temperature.After awhile all the meals taste the same.Vegetables are soggy.

Headline: Great Meals large selections like the‚Ä¶
Review: Great Meals large selections like the add on. Also like the option to skip a week if need be.

Headline: Keep up the good work.
Review: Keep up the good work.TyDM

Headline: Good meals for on the go!
The food is good
Review: The food is good. Just a tad spicy. For those of us on fixed income it is a little pricey

Headline: Awesome food
Review: All of the meals have been delicious and nutritious.

Headline: Tiemly delivery of meals and food‚Ä¶
Review: Tiemly delivery of meals and food tastes great!

Headline: I enjoy the food and the convenience
Review: I enjoy the food and the convenience, I don't like being forced to have to receive a minimum of 4 meals/week.There should be an option to receive as few as I like.  If I only want 1/week, I should have that option.

Headline: The food was pretty good..alittle‚Ä¶
Review: The food was pretty good..alittle garlicky for me..I found skipping weeks apparently confusing because twice I got boxes I didn't order.

Headline: Really good quality food
Review: Really good quality food. Not bland like your typical frozen food. Yummy.

Headline: I did
Review: I did. Not  order Factor75.  I subscribed to Factor but did like it and unsubscribed.  You continue to send me boxes and charge me 160$ a week. I refused the most recent box and had the payment frozen.  Paula Hite2702434433

Headline: Food is healthy and delicious and a‚Ä¶
Review: Food is healthy and delicious and a good variety is available to chose from. The deliveries are reliable.

Headline: The food is delicious
Review: The food is delicious. Our only complaint is the drivers. They throw the box every delivery and multiple meals end up exploding from the impact and are inedible.

Headline: My Honest Review
Review: I was excited to try Factor because of my co-worker‚Äôs recommendations. However, I had a poor experience the first week. I placed an order for 14 meals and I only received 10 meals. I did not receive proper notification of the missing meals. It was only when I opened my package and discovered them not in there. I called customer service and informed them of my poor experience. Since then, it has gotten progressively better. I will note that Factor‚Äôs packagings secure,  neatly organized and kept fresh.

Headline: Good food in little time
Review: Food taste good. It's takes only minutes to have dinner on the table.

Headline: Fresh and tasty
Review: The food is fresh and tastes good. Great variety of options. Delivery is on time and in good shape.

Headline: So far the meals are not the most tasty‚Ä¶
Review: So far the meals are not the most tasty that I have had for frozen meals and the price is high for the quality of the meals. The meals are enough for a lunch portion, but would not highly recommend them based on price per meal.

Headline: One of my meals container was cracked‚Ä¶
Review: One of my meals container was cracked so when I opened up the box it was strong smell and obviously couldn‚Äôt eat that meal. Pork chop was horrible. It was so tough. Stuffed peppers was yummy. Too expensive to continue.

Headline: Delicious
Review: The food is great it‚Äôs like having leftovers from a fancy restaurant every day. It‚Äôs a bit expensive but worth it. Also like that you can switch it up every week and it‚Äôs not frozen food

Headline: Good program, but hard to justify the price.
Review: The factor meals are good tasting, and convenient.  After having them for a few weeks however I can not justify the cost of them.  I can buy the groceries and meal prep for a lot less.

Headline: I have been using factor on and off for‚Ä¶
Review: I have been using factor on and off for a year. The meals are always spot on and delicious. This last box was not the same. I was missing two meals. The creamy zoodles and chicken was not very good. Very little chicken and zoodles with a ton of cream. I will continue to purchase from factor as this was one out of 50 meals I have tried

Headline: Good quality
Review: Good quality, taste, and good mix of foods included.

Headline: Best premade food I ever tried.
The best to ever do it !
Review: Awesome ! Easy! Fast ! Convenient ! Delicious !

Headline: Delicious Meals & Quick Prep
Review: My husband and I really love how easy and delicious these meal are. It is really easy to pop it in the microwave and eat an amazing dish that keeps us full. We really enjoy getting these meals since we have no time with our little 1yr old boy.

Headline: I decided to cancel my factor‚Ä¶
Review: I decided to cancel my factor subscription. The meals are very expensive. I kept this service in hopes that they were just having a bad couple weeks. After 6 weeks it‚Äôs time to call it quits. They not only don‚Äôt deliver on time. Two different time I didn‚Äôt receive meals that were ordered because of ingredient shortage. Three meals were recalled for under cooked chicken. And there rewards for remaining a customer are a joke. They will give you free boxes to give to others to try to get them to sign up. Not at all satisfactory. The whole experience was bad.

Headline: Based on my own experience
Review: Based on my own experience, I kindly inform you to never subscribe without checking your bank account thoroughly. It's better to cook for yourself and buy things in the normal way.

Headline: The food is delicious, but...
Review: The food is delicious.  However, the meals have a bit more carbs than I would like.  Also, it is pretty ridiculous for them to claim I earned a "reward" which is just them using me as their marketing by giving a "free box" to a friend.  Why not give the current customer a few free meals as their reward.  Maybe then the customer would be happy to share their Factor experience.

Headline: Edible
Review: Edible.  Not the best.  At first, a bit confusing on how it works.Good support staff.Not bad for frozen meals.  Better option than local fast food places.

Headline: Every meal I've tried has been great
Review: Every meal I've tried has been great. So convenient. I work long days and when I get home, it is nice to not have to cook and have something nutritious and delicious.

Headline: Great meals tasty and so convenient
The food tasted good and it made me‚Ä¶
Review: The food tasted good and it made me feel full after eating it.

Headline: Factor meals are freshly made and all‚Ä¶
Review: Factor meals are freshly made and all we've tried have been tasty.  Portions are ample, heat-up is quick, no issues w/ delivery...Factor has become a great part of our healthy eating strategy in just a short time.

Headline: Sad to Glad
Review: Sad to GladThe young lady was very polite, professional, and patient. She listened to me for understanding and resolved my issues

Headline: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service.  My order was supposed to have 6 items and came with 3. I got hung up on twice. They wouldn't send me the missing meals and the first two agents refused to credit my card on file. I had to call three times.

Headline: The first meal delivery service that I‚Ä¶
Review: The first meal delivery service that I thought the food quality was actually good, along with a variety of options and the app works very well.

Headline: Out of 5 meals I have eaten,
Review: Out of 5 meals I have eaten,3 were exceptional, 1 was great and 1 was so so.

Headline: 100% Recommend
Review: Orders are packaged well, delivered in a timely well communicated  manner. The meals are seriously convenient with the majority of the them tasting absolutely delicious.

Headline: I have enjoyed the most of the meals
Review: I have enjoyed the most of the meals.  I can't afford to keep buying this though.

Headline: I've received 3 deliveries from Factor
Review: I've received 3 deliveries from Factor, 2 of the 3 have been short at least 1 meal due to the shortage of product?What I have received have been very good, taste great, fresh. Worth the money.

Headline: Highly recommend
Review: Each dish has its own well seasoned flavor - everything doesn't taste the same.  Veggies still have a bite to them and taste fresh - not cooked till mushy.  There's a very large diverse selection and the choices are yours.  Or you can go with what Factor chooses.    There are splurges, or I can go "calorie smart" or vegetarian as I want.   Online menu is easy to use, it's easy to skip a week.  Great user experience.

Headline: Haven‚Äôt had one meal that wasn‚Äôt‚Ä¶
Review: Haven‚Äôt had one meal that wasn‚Äôt delicious!!

Headline: The food is fresh and tastes for‚Ä¶
Review: The food is fresh and tastes for various dishes are varied and very good.

Headline: I‚Äôm so glad I finally tried Factor!!!
Review: The meals are delicious and perfectly proportioned. Being able to skip a week when needed is great.I bought a gourmet option, the filet‚Ä¶my son had it too and loved it! I see no reason to ever by and prepare my own again! I‚Äôm so glad I finally tried Factor!

Headline: The meals were ok
Review: The meals were ok, not enough to make a meal. Charged for 8 when we did not get the full amount.

Headline: Ease of ordering
Review: Ease of ordering.  Nice variety of meal options.Fresh and microwaveable.

Headline: These meals are great tasting and easy
Review: These meals are great tasting and easy! Helps me stay on task with my dinner without having to think about it.

Headline: We‚Äôve had issues with our last 4 boxes BUT FACTOR MADE SURE I WAS HEARD
Review: Update: With the below issues I did reach out to customer service and they ultimately made it right. After this review I was contacted and the care team went above and beyond to make me feel heard and wanted as a customer. THE FOOD HAS ALWAYS BEEN DELICIOUS. And I believe the success factor saw so quickly may have lead to growing pains. I‚Äôm changing my 2 star review to a 5 based on the quality of the food AND the efforts made by every team member who I‚Äôve worked with. Factor employs great people and this should be celebrated. Original Post: We‚Äôve had issues with our last 4 boxes. They‚Äôve had missing meals, or wrong meals. We‚Äôve had broken gel packs leaked all over, and a 2 day delay on our last box. If ever box continues to be problematic we will likely cancel.

Headline: Great experience
Review: The food has been delicious, lasts a long time and is delivered on time.

Headline: I use the app my fitnesspal and some of‚Ä¶
Review: I use the app my fitnesspal and some of the food has wrong calorie count and wrong protein count.

Headline: Good stuff my friends keep it up
Really tasty food
Review: Really tasty food, good portion size and delivery is on time & friendly. Only complaint is not enough green vegetable variety.

Headline: They sent he same things I didn‚Äôt like ‚Ä¶
Review: They sent he same things I didn‚Äôt like  I don‚Äôt eat spicy foods I think I need more  regular food maybe some Asian dishes more just regular food I filled out another revue and still got the same food I deselected stuff and added stuff for this week let‚Äôs see what I get this time

Headline: Loving it!!
Review: Food has been amazing, and fresh. Great communication from the company if there‚Äôs any changes or anything i need to be alerted about. Have and will continue to recommend to friends üòä

Headline: Love this company
Review: Everything about this company is excellent in my opinion.  Service, shipping, portions and taste.  Very pleased!

Headline: I‚Äôm really enjoying the meals!
Review: I‚Äôm really enjoying the meals!!  They‚Äôre healthy and fabulous!!

Headline: All the meals are fresh and flavorful
Review: All the meals are fresh and flavorful. So much cheaper, tastier, and even more convenient than fast food during the week.

Headline: Factor is the best meal delivery we have tried.
Review: We have loved every thing about Factor. The meals are delicious, so easy to prepare and perfect portion size! They are delivered on time. We travel a lot so it can be paused any time and I love being able to pick my meals. We can't say enough about how easy it is, but on top of all of that the meals are priced right.

Headline: The food is very good ( most of it) I‚Ä¶
Review: The food is very good ( most of it) I would appreciate more entree choices it‚Äôs always chicken for the most part. I think the prices are a little high for the portion size

Headline: Shipping and packaging disconnect‚Ä¶
Review: The order was a day late which is The second time in a row it's been late I understand delays happen but only 4 items of 12 were shipped.

Headline: Arrived on time and delivered exactly‚Ä¶
Review: Arrived on time and delivered exactly as requested, not just once but so far 4 x in a row!  Quality is great, portions are generous, taste is 5 out of 5!!!  Cost is helping me save $$$$!

Headline: Loving the experience
Review: Loving the experience. It has made my life so much easier.  And they are delicious.

Headline: The food has been good but I‚Äôve only‚Ä¶
Review: The food has been good but I‚Äôve only had this for three weeks and already received emails that I may have received undercooked chicken and that they are out of ingredients for a separate meal.

Headline: The first three boxes were incorrect‚Ä¶
Review: The first three boxes were incorrect however my last box was correct.  Just a very disappointing impression at the beginning

Headline: Fresh. Convenient. Quick. Best flavor!
Review: The food arrives fresh, ready to heat in the microwave for all of 2 minutes ( I do 2:15). The food is so much better than anything I‚Äôve ordered from others, whether I make it myself or frozen. Factor foods are simply the best in taste, convenience and value for me.

Headline: New customer, very happy...
Review: Great and very convenient,  very good.

Headline: We received 2 of our 6 meals with‚Ä¶
Review: We received 2 of our 6 meals with cracks in the containers and were not able to eat them. Tried to reach out and heard nothing back.

Headline: The food is fresh and delicious and easy
Likes:Taste of most meals was great 75%‚Ä¶
Review: Likes:Taste of most meals was great 75% of the time. Dislikes: too much chicken meals, not enough potatos and too much cauliflower based veggies.

Headline: Great food
Review: Food was great and easy to prepare.

Headline: Ok good
Review: Ok but too saucy and buttery

Headline: Factor delivery
Review: I am happy with the service and the meals from Factor. The food is delicious and the recipes of the meals are things I've never thought of creating myself. They give me variety of choices to enjoy.

Headline: Delicious food always on time and‚Ä¶
Review: Delicious food always on time and exceeding my expatiation every time and the app is easy to manage and what I was looking for in a good delivery service

Headline: You are doing great work
Review: The service is good and the idea of having food that will be ready in two minutes is great and the food quality is weak and makes farts smells extremely stinky besides the fact that I can‚Äôt conceder it as a meal but i can say snacks

Headline: I would not use Factor
Review: I used Factor for 3 orders. The first box arrived-no issue. The second one never arrived. They said it was an issue with the carrier. I contacted them and they never received the box from Factor. They issued me a credit. My third box charged rather than using credits on my account. Credits cannot be applied to discounted boxes. I called, they refunded my card. They actually never processed that refund. In the meantime, 2 meal recalls for undercooked chicken. Third box arrives with only ice packs and no meals. I call for this refund and they actually do process this. I call the next day about box 2 refund and it‚Äôs a chore. The agent keeps telling me I got a refund but can‚Äôt put it together that box 3 was refunded not box 2. Eventually, they issued it but for $30 less that it should have been. I gave up and just canceled. It‚Äôs not worth my time to keep fighting for the $30. Paid for 3 boxes, got 1, got refunded for less than I paid for the missing ones.

Headline: The food is great!!
Review: The efficiency of delivery, the food is very good!

Headline: Food is delicious
Review: Food is delicious, perfect portion size, and ready in 2 minutes!

Headline: The meals taste great
Review: The meals taste great. They don't take long to heat up. The variety of choices are really good too. I like that I can get more than one of a particular meal that I like.

Headline: TERRIBLE
Review: TERRIBLE. AND WHEN THEY MAKE A MISTAKE IN THEIR END THEY DONT WANT TO PAY U BACK FOR THIER MISTAKES‚Ä¶I  DIDNT RECEIVE MY BOX. They kept my $211.00.And I still haven‚Äôt received my money back. Then They sent me a box with PORK THEY SELECTED WITHOUT MY PERMISSION. AND IN ORDER TO CORRECT THE PROBLEM, THEY KEPT ALL OF KY CREDITS WITHOUT MY KNOWLEDGE. THEY WHEN U FIRST SIGN UP WITH 5 DISCOUNT BOXES. AND I ONLY RECEIVED 2. AND THEY KEPT MY OTHER 3 BOXES I WAS PROMISED WHEN I FIRST SIGNED UP.I WILL NE DELETING MY ACCOUNT VERY SOON BECAUSE I HAVE BEEN TREATED UNFAIRLY EVER SINCE I STARTED WITH FACTOR‚Ä¶..

Review: Seems like the only veggie choices are green beans and broccoli.  Gets old for regular meals. Also the meal.choices are getting less and less appealing.  I'm ending my meal plan and try something else.

Headline: Try Factor- you won‚Äôt be sorry
Review: Food is delicious.  We have enjoyed every meal.  Communications from Factor about delivery date changes due to holidays, delays, etc. are great.

Headline: The food selection was great

Headline: I never signed up for you guys to‚Ä¶

Review: So far, we love our Factor meals. Very tasty. The delivery process is great. Texts telling you when it will arrive, and that it has arrived. It is a very simple process if you need to change your meals or skip a week.

Headline: Still have not received my the 88‚Ä¶

Headline: Food the easy way!
Review: food is good and easy to prepare. Deliveries as promised! choices are good

Headline: The food is delicious
Review: The food is delicious, lots of choices, and very easy to navigate their website to choose or make changes.

Headline: I did not order any meals
Review: I did not order any meals. I did look at your website, but I didn‚Äôt like the menu so I canceled my data without picking out any meals. I definitely did not order anything and I have canceled my credit card that you hay.

Headline: The food is very good
Review: The food is very good, delivered on time.  I have recommended this service to others.  Some shipments were missing meals and I was refunded.  Some times my meals look like someone kicked them around because all the food is all mashed/mixed up and others are fine in the delivery box. The juices and lunches are great.  Customer service is excellent.   Despite a couple of issues, I would recommend and will continue to order.

Headline: The food is surprisingly delicious
Review: The food is surprisingly delicious! I haven't had a bad meal yet, I'm shocked. A little pricey but mostly worth the cost.

Headline: The food is generally excellent!
Review: The food is generally excellent, the proteins are always tender and every meal has tasted great!

Headline: Great meal choices that have delivered‚Ä¶
Review: Great meal choices that have delivered on quality and taste.

Headline: It's probably the best food quality for‚Ä¶
Review: It's probably the best food quality for a food delivery that I've ever used. The 2 minute cooking instruction on the microwave never works. It's 3 minutes or 3 and 1/2 minutes in my meals. I do love them. The only thing I do not like about factor is the constant barrage of trying to sell our friends on the product. That is very annoying. But who am I to tell someone how to run their business..

Headline: One of the meals was broken in the‚Ä¶
Review: One of the meals was broken in the package

Headline: Tasty food quick and easy
Review: Tasty food quick and easy with flexible ordering.

Headline: The food is delicious.always had a green vegetable. I always rad the ingredients, and am pleased with the healthy ingredients.  No dishes.
Review: The food is delicious.

Headline: Food is very good
Review: Food is very good. Heats up fast so it‚Äôs great for those busy days.
